node.description: Several small gardens, each with a tidy stone border, line the road along the edge of a genteel residential area. Several tall stakes control long strands of curling vines, laden with pea-pods.

Several small gardens, each with a tidy stone border, line the road along the edge of a genteel residential area. Several tall stakes control long strands of curling vines, laden with pea-pods. A brace of geese wander about, pecking at half-buried seeds in the dirt.

node.name: Ratha, Upper Cobra Road
node.description: The smells of cooking and the sound of cheerful laughter emanate from a rambling tavern on the west side of the road. The otherwise drab stone of its roof has been worked along the edge into a series of brightly-painted cameos depicting comically absurd portraits.

node.name: Ratha, Upper Cobra Road
node.description: The backs of several large warehouses present a blank facade along the road. Rough grey stone rises on both sides, cutting off any breeze and fencing in the noise and smells of a crowded town. Faded chalk outlines on one wall are all that remain of some forgotten children's game or picture.

node.name: Ratha, Upper Cobra Road
node.description: Traffic is quite heavy, despite the hour. A few lanterns placed on rocky perches cast a feeble light on the crossroads. A sleepy-looking guardsman leans on a pike, keeping half an eye on the road.

Two roads meet in a busy intersection. It seems as if every person in the tier is trying to pass through the same crossing all at one time. Several cracked and broken paving stones in the center of the roadway force traffic to veer around the area, creating a tiny island of empty space.

node.name: Ratha, Mastik Mews
node.description: As the throng of citizens heads north from the lifts, this delightful little road heads west over the ridge toward some of the most beautiful scenery Ratha has to offer. Weeping bloodwood trees form a graceful arch over the roadway, while neat white pickets surround a cluster of tidy homes.

node.name: Ratha, Mastik Mews
node.description: Sweet scents float through the calm night air. Glowing embers from the cooking fires die slowly, the residents long taken to their beds, and slumbering peacefully.

All around, the signs of a thriving community abound. Young children, actively play in the streets and yards of the well kept homes, while women hang laundry out on lines to dry. Conspicuously missing are the men, likely away at sea, the craft-halls or out hunting to stock the family larder. On both sides of the lane, bright jadsem blossoms and freesia lend a pleasant sweet scent to the air.

node.name: Ratha, Mastik Mews
node.description: Spectres of the afternoon hustle and bustle are called forth by the soft whinny of a horse nearby. The sparkling night view of the city below and the roiling ocean beyond is a joy to behold.

Horse drawn carts amble past, laden with goods from the marketplace to the north. A driver stops to water his horse at one of the many troughs along the tree-lined route. Toward the southwest, a beautiful unobstructed view of the ocean awaits the passerby, eager for a break from their daily chores.

node.name: Ratha, Mastik Mews
node.description: The neighborhood garden is silent, resting after a busy day of cultivation and activity. A bustling center of activity by day, the garden lends quiet comfort to this quaint community in the long evening hours.

Bees buzz happily, finding a wealth of pollen in the neat rows of flowers and vegetables of a community garden. Neighbors chat casually as they share in the toils of tending the plot. Covered and protected against the elements, the more delicate of the fruits and flowers flourish under the added attention.

node.name: Ratha, Mastik Mews
node.description: Several people gather around a large brick firepit outside a neatly trimmed cottage. Billowing smoke wraps around the stone chimney as a wild boar turns slowly over the coals, fat dripping into the flames. On smaller spits, a number of plump birds roast slowly, and large pots of bubbling liquids add their steam and delicious smells to the atmosphere.

node.name: Ratha, Odalva Reach
node.description: The well worn stone wall nearly rings with the day's conversations. Now quiet and peaceful, this delightful lane wends its way through the slumbering community.

Delicious smells permeate the air, creating an atmosphere of comfort and home. All who stroll down this delightful lane are pulled aside to visit or partake in a sip of grog or cold spring water. A trio of old women, leaning across a stone wall, are enrapt in a story telling session, oblivious to the world around them.

node.name: Ratha, Odalva Reach
node.description: Fingers of starlight filter through the lush canopy of bloodwood and sana'ati trees as the avenue broadens. Protected from the frequent wind and rain sweeping off the ocean, the drive takes on an almost dream-like quality. On the north side of the reach, gentle rolling knolls are host to a variety of well kept homes with dramatic views of the sparkling sea beyond the cliffs.

Fingers of light filter through the lush canopy of bloodwood and sana'ati trees as the avenue broadens. Protected from the afternoon sun or the wind and rain sweeping off the ocean, the drive takes on an almost dream-like quality. On the north side of the reach, gentle rolling knolls are host to a variety of well kept homes with dramatic views of the crystal sea beyond the cliffs.

node.name: Ratha, Odalva Reach
node.description: The denseness of the arboreal adit gives way briefly, allowing an unobstructed view of the shipyards far below, and the jetty beyond. From this vantage point one can clearly observe the traffic in and out of the harbor. It is said that the Odalva family purchased property on this bluff to keep track of the vast Redthorne fleet.

node.name: Ratha, Odalva Reach
node.description: Veering close to the precipice, the avenue broadens slightly to form a small viewpoint. The sights, sounds and even the smells of the city below can be experienced when the wind is blowing just right. Scuffing and footprints can be seen just over the sturdy retaining wall, not two feet from a very obvious warning sign.

node.name: Ratha, Odalva Reach
node.description: Enveloping the avenue, spreading masses of lush greenery play about the gnarled wood and sinewy branches. Long, protective arms reach downward, toward the decorative stones along the fenceline. Just ahead, a rolling meadow unfolds, hugging the north side of the road.

node.name: Ratha, Odalva Reach
node.description: The softly rolling hillside whispers with the hushed sounds of grasses and flowers blowing in the gentle evening breeze. Worn down by many a footfall, a trail meanders away from the road towards the quiet meadows.

Thousands of pale purple shalyria blossoms blanket the hillside in soft waves, complementing the deep tones of the taffelberries, ripe and tasty, that abound in the meadow. Worn and winding, a trail meanders away from the road toward the sound of laughter and music.

node.name: Ratha, Odalva Reach
node.description: Skirting along the meadow, the road ambles toward the cliff's edge and two large homes, perched precariously close to the precipice. On the opposite side of the road, stables and gardens make best use of the grassy knoll and ample acreage.

node.name: Ratha, Odalva Reach
node.description: Subtle fragrances waft through the air, hibiscus, cherry blossom, something else not quite identifiable. Carstens, the florist, has gardens nearby and often roams the neighborhood selling his delicate and fresh-picked wares to the eager locals.

node.name: Ratha, Odalva Reach
node.description: Breezes blow stronger here, as the road approaches the western overlook and the windward side of the bluff. The thick stand of sana'ati gives way to smaller, sculpted pine trees. Though still ornamental and pleasant to look upon, the plants and flowers here have adapted to the elements, taking on a distinctly squat and sturdy posture.

node.name: Ratha, Cliffside Viewpoint
node.description: Diamonds of light sparkle off the surface of the ocean. A stiff breeze blows constantly here, whipping the salt air against the side of the cliff in playful whorls. Far out in the harbor, various ships lay at anchor, awaiting their turn in the busy port of Ratha. Below, one needs only spy the griminess of the lower tier of the city to be reminded that all is not as unspoiled as this panorama proclaims.

node.name: Ratha, Selridge Road
node.description: Couples from all over Ratha frequent the overlook, making it a favorite spot for a romantic afternoon or evening stroll. Slowly and happily, most that visit here soon wander north toward the merchant district and the ever popular bazaar.

node.name: Ratha, Selridge Road
node.description: Windblown grasses cling to sandy cracks in the walkways that bypass several tidy homes along the road. Iron gates and covered porticos offer security and protection from the evening elements. Tall and stately street lamps perform their nightly ritual, offering a ray or two of warm light to the evening stroller.

Windblown grasses cling to sandy cracks in the walkways that bypass several tidy homes along the road. Iron gates and shaded porticos offer privacy and shelter from the afternoon sun while tall and stately street lamps await a nightly ritual, offering a ray or two of warm light to the evening stroller.

node.name: Ratha, Selridge Road
node.description: Tempests and whorls of salty air whip past, sending sand and dust flying inland. Gnarled and deformed by the constant wind, a stand of dwarf pine hum as if goading the spirits of the wind into a battle of wits.

node.name: Ratha, Selridge Road
node.description: Spicy and aromatic, the scents of a growing herb garden drift past. Rich and loamy, the soil and climate here are perfect for growing everything from brilliant flowers to flavorful vegetables. Just ahead the welcoming lights of the Carstens farmhouse can be seen towering over darkened gardens.

Spicy and aromatic, the scents of a growing herb garden drift past. Rich and loamy, the soil and climate here are perfect for growing everything from brilliant flowers to flavorful vegetables. Just ahead the white gables of the Carstens farmhouse can be seen towering over neat rows of blooming finery.

node.name: Ratha, Selridge Road
node.description: Wild grapevines along a rickety fence cast strange shadows from the lamplight in the dark. Sweet smells from the gardens beyond lend to the intoxicating environment along the tree-lined road.

Vibrant lavender and wild grape vines adorn a rickety fence along the western edge of the Carstens place. Folks amble past, stopping to smell the sweet flowers and admire the upcoming crop of unusual floral varieties that Carstens is famous for. Dwarf pine and an occasional silverwood tree line the inlaid walkways along the road, a rich mosaic nearly lost in the sand from the cliff.

node.name: Ratha, Selridge Road
node.description: A high stone wall, meant to protect the street from wind and erosion, blends with the outer walls of an impressive home at the cliff's edge. For several hundred paces along the roadway the old fortress towers, appearing abandoned, yet ever watchful. Folks say that the Odalva family owns the property and that sometimes, late at night, strange activities can be observed in and around the mysterious manse.

node.name: Ratha, Selridge Road
node.description: Continuing the inlaid stone motif, a high wall protects the street here from the whipping winds that frequent this side of the bluff. In the distance, the tinkle of chimes plays an erratic melody in harmony with the constant drone of the city, and the crashing surf beyond the cliffs.

node.name: Amakra Close, Windward Overlook
node.description: Hand quarried stone, inlaid with onyx tiles, form a handsome pattern on the floor of the overlook. This delightful viewpoint is enclosed with sturdy matching walls and the ancient stone archway to the east. Benches line the walls, and an ancient telescope, atop a small raised dais, offers the viewer a chance to observe the heavens.

node.name: Ratha, Upper Cobra Road
node.description: The road leading into the town from the great lift crosses a large east-west road that serves the merchant quarters that make up the bulk of the inhabitants of this level. A continual rush of traffic scurries about in all directions, taking little heed of anyone foolish enough to stand and gape at the hubbub. A tall flagpost rises in the center of the crossroad, pennon snapping in the sea-breeze.

node.name: Ratha, Upper Cobra Road
node.description: A row of small storage yards are neatly filled with crates and bales stacked two and three high. Traffic in and out of the area suggests that it is used by merchants as a clearing house for goods sold at the famous Ratha bazaar.

node.name: Ratha, Upper Cobra Road
node.description: Traffic along this section of the busy road is typically limited to carriages and supply wagons destined for the homes on the tier. The larger section of the road to the west and north, takes travelers toward the great lifts of the palace level or the portside district below.

node.name: Ratha, Kor'adu Avenue
node.description: A few steps off the road, atop a slight rise, a bevy of small cottages beckon the weary home for the evening. Clean and well cared for, the homes in this area are neither shabby nor elegant.

A few steps off the road, atop a slight rise, a bevy of small cottages are oriented toward the remarkable view of the ocean beyond. Clean and well cared for, the homes in this area are neither shabby nor elegant. Bescarved housewives are often seen traversing the walkways and crossing the street to chat with passing salesman.

node.name: Ratha, Kor'adu Avenue
node.description: The avenue sweeps toward the south and east and a lovely view of the city below. The sparkling ocean, ever present from nearly every spot in Ratha is a constant reminder of the hard working way of life the town has to offer.

node.name: Ratha, Tierskel Way
node.description: A small monument rests here, overlooking the busy port district of the city below. To this day the Tierskel family, long involved in the development of seafaring trade in this region, controls the docks and shipyards.

node.name: Ratha, Tierskel Way
node.description: Interesting serpentine patterns adorn a low stone wall on the cliff side of the avenue. With access to goods from distant ports of call, it's not surprising to find foreign art and cultures influencing much of the Rathan architecture.

node.name: Ratha, Tierskel Way
node.description: Beyond the safety of a low stone retaining wall, a cliff divides this level of the city from the lower warehouse district below. With a slight adjustment of the eyes, the onlooker can forget the toil and chaos of the city below, and become lost in the depths of the crystal sea beyond.

node.name: Ratha, Tierskel Way
node.description: The smell of straw and the occasional whinny of a horse heralds the presence of a livery service someplace closeby. Hired out for pleasure or in service to specific delivery services, horses play an important part in the transportation of people and goods around town.

node.name: Ratha, Tierskel Way
node.description: A cluster of homes is set back away from the traffic of the avenue, taking advantage of the view from atop a slight rise. A dirt lane serves as a drive connecting the homes to the road, forming what could be construed as a cul-de-sac.

node.name: Ratha, Tierskel Way
node.description: Both spectacular and dangerous, the view at this point is nonetheless exhilarating. The stone wall protects the average traveler from the perilous cliffs, but too eager a spectator could easily find themselves awash in the churning surf and the rocks below.

node.name: Ratha, Tierskel Way
node.description: Fields and walkways are quiet and settled for another night's slumber. Come morning, the eager voices of children at play will once again carry aloft on the gentle breezes.

Gentle breezes blow on this side of the island. Beyond the low fence of a large field children are often seen at play, hiding behind large boulders or stone walls, they frequently imitate hunters who range far beyond the limits of the city.

node.name: Ratha, Tierskel Way
node.description: A wide brick walkway commands the eastern side of the bluff, as the drive takes a turn toward the most beautiful of scenic finery on Ratha. Stretching as far as the eye can see, a sparkling crystal ocean lays like a blanket surrounding the island.

node.name: Ratha, Tierskel Way
node.description: A quiet, tree-lined lane meanders off toward the west. Unable to wander past the confines of a locked gate, the passerby is left to wonder what manner of mystery lays beyond the iron scrollwork. Birdsong and laughter are carried aloft on a soft breeze, reminders of a carefree existence somewhere closeby.

node.name: Ratha, Tierskel Way
node.description: Charming cottages and small homes sit close together, tiled walkways and neat gardens setting one apart from the other. Residents can often be seen sitting on porches late into the night, puffing on pipes, drinking cider or just watching the stars play upon the ocean.
Charming cottages and small homes sit close together, tiled walkways and neat gardens setting one apart from the other. Women gather in the largest of several yards, discussing the events of the day.

node.name: Ratha, Tierskel Way
node.description: The avenue is broad and decidedly residential. The homes are not overly large or elegant, but well kept and nicely appointed. The children who often play in the gardens and along the walkways, are tucked into their beds slumbering now as the stars come out to play.

The avenue is broad and decidedly residential. The homes are not overly large or elegant, but well kept and nicely appointed. A group of children can often be seen playing in the gardens and along the walkways, shouting happily to one another.

node.name: Ratha, Tierskel Way
node.description: Broad ironwoods grow tall on this side of the island protecting many small homes nestled under their protective foliage. Like giants standing guard on this ocean-side knoll, they weave an eerie atmosphere as the shadows of moonlight play hide and seek.

Broad ironwoods grow tall on this side of the island protecting many small homes nestled under their protective foliage. Like giants standing guard on this ocean-side knoll, they weave an eerie atmosphere as the shadows of the day grow long.

node.name: Ratha, Tierskel Way
node.description: A darkened home sits back from the road, surrounded by a high iron fence. The gate is bolted shut as if the owner had been away for a long while.
An odd looking home sits back from the road, surrounded by a high iron fence. The gate is bolted shut as if the owner had been away for a long while.

node.name: Ratha, Tierskel Way
node.description: A row of neatly trimmed buildings sits back off the road, warm lamplight radiating from the windows. Most businesses, which are closed for the night, leave a lamp or candle burning to inform townsfolk that the owners are in residence and available for emergencies.
Neat and well kept buildings are set back from the road here. Townsfolk scurry by, engaged in animated conversation, on their way to perform one errand or another.

node.name: Ratha, Tierskel Way
node.description: A young family makes their way along the stone walkway toward the south and the beautiful views of the ocean. A sturdy stone wall abuts the walkway and provides a safe barrier from the treachery of the sheer cliff beyond.

node.name: Ratha, Tierskel Way
node.description: Carriage traffic is very sporadic during the quiet hours of the evening and early morning. On occasion a group of drunken sailors ambles through, lost from the main thoroughfare and creating a disturbance in the quiet neighborhood awaking angry residents from their slumber.
Carriages trundle in both directions, barely enough time is had to avoid the hooves of the great equines as they prance at a feverish pace.

node.name: Ratha, Kor'adu Avenue
node.description: A brick and timber building rises three floors above the avenue, small paned windows taking advantage of the southwest exposure. The muted clang of a ship's bell, belies the presence of the busy port somewhere in the distance.

node.name: Ratha, Kor'adu Avenue
node.description: Several lovely homes find themselves ensconced amid neatly clipped shrubbery and tidy walkways. Serviceable if not attractive fencing provides a bit of security to the urban neighborhood.

node.name: Ratha, Kor'adu Avenue
node.description: A tiny shed sits at quite a peculiar angle just off the avenue, adjoined to an equally peculiar little cottage. Sumptuous smells often linger in the air here, making the cottage the frequent subject of local prattle.

node.name: Ratha, Kor'adu Avenue
node.description: Bright awnings and colorful pennants adorn the facade of a neat mud and brick building. A lovely portico dotted with delightful iron chairs and matching tables offer weary shoppers a place to stop and catch their breath.

node.name: Ratha, Kor'adu Avenue
node.description: The darkened facade of a large building casts a shadow on the street below. A wall of wooden crates blocks passage along the walkway, forcing pedestrians into the street and the path of trotting hoofbeats.

node.name: Ratha, Upper Cobra Road
node.description: A pair of stone nagas rise to either side of the great lifts that lead to the third tier and the seat of power. Liveried messengers hurry past, bearing important documents for the traders and merchants who do business on this level. A nearby barracks holds a complement of guards, ready day and night to secure the approaches if rioting or rebellion should break out among the lower classes and threaten the island's trade.

node.name: Ratha, Upper Cobra Road
node.description: Cool sea-breezes sweep across the rocky precipice that divides lower Ratha from the higher class districts. The massive lifts work day and night, hauling people and goods up and down between the levels. The view from here is considerable, with many ships in the harbor below displaying all manner of construction and decoration, hailing from a dozen different ports of call.

node.name: Ratha, Rocky Shore
node.description: Below the shadow of the rickety buildings and warehouses of the city, a steep, rugged shore leads down into the shallows. Rocks jut out along the coastline, while ocean waves rush past with frothy white peaks to crash along the cliffs. Off in the distance, caught on the sharp crags is an abandoned ship, lying partially on its side. The shallows themselves seem traversable between the rocks and the bluffs, the obstacles helping to keep the undertow in check.

node.name: Ratha, Sandy Path
node.description: Strewn with sandstone and driftwood, the path heads off towards the base of the cliff. Footprints in the sand appear recent.

node.name: Ratha, Base of the Cliff
node.description: Abruptly, the short path comes to an end at the base of a sheer cliff. Sand and rock crumble with each step as scattered debris, rocks and, what appears to be crushed bone, lay strewn about. From this vantage point, the cliff appears unclimbable, with barely a hint of a hand or foot-hold discernable.

node.name: Odalva Reach, Narrow Ledge
node.description: With a start you find yourself standing on the lip of the narrowest ledge imaginable. The face of the cliff rises before you, disappearing as quickly under your feet. The slightest movement causes a cascade of small stones to plummet the remaining distance to the rock strewn ground below.

node.name: Odalva Reach, Edge of Cliff
node.description: Despite the warning sign posted plainly at the cliff's edge, there are signs that a few foolhardy individuals have tested their climbing skills. Peering over the edge of the cliff, one can imagine that a number of those fools have perished in the attempt. Bypassers linger just over a sturdy retaining wall, taking in the view.

Despite the warning sign posted plainly at the cliff's edge, there are signs that a few foolhardy individuals have tested their climbing skills. Peering over the edge of the cliff, one can imagine that a number of those fools have perished in the attempt. Passersby linger just over a sturdy retaining wall, taking in the view.

node.name: Ratha, Lift
node.description: The fine polished oak floor is scarred by the travel of cloven hooves and careless weaponmasters. Despite the brutishness of some travelers the lift is well-maintained and operates near flawlessly.

node.name: Uaro Dock, Port of Ratha
node.description: Crates of all sizes and shapes, labeled and stamped, pile to make haphazard pyramids upon the long planks. Heavy fishing nets are strung across the crates to the dock cleats to dry in the wind and a strong odor of salt and fish rises in the warm, humid air.

node.name: Kygar's Pub, Common Room
node.description: Long tables lined with matching benches fill the roomy pub, standing over a sawdust-covered floor swept clean every day. Bunches of drying herbs hanging from rafters add spicy scents that mingle with the aromas of meats roasting on spits and the freshly-popped corn kernels that fill wooden bowls. A small stage has been set up in one corner for minstrels, storytellers and other entertainers. Contrasting shouts of glee and groans of dismay come from rooms set off to the east and the west.

node.name: Kygar's Pub, Courtyard
node.description: Feathery ferns and seasonal flowers grow abundantly in beds that circle the courtyard, surrounding numerous tables, each with its own canvas umbrella to shelter customers from inclement weather. A half dozen tall torchieres are imbedded in the ground giving off light and warmth. Bowls of crunchy popped corn, a longtime tradition of Kygar's Pub, sit on each table.

node.name: Grimbly's Forge, Supplies and Rental Office
node.description: The shop is filled with the smell of raw metals, a smell so sharp that it clings to the teeth. A large iron door stands at the back of the room, acting as a barricade between the forge and the front shop. Leaning on the door eyeing the patrons is Grimbly herself, a handsome 'Tog in full chain armor and custom forged jewelry. Sitting at a ticket counter is an elderly Elothean sales clerk, keeping Grimbly's affairs in order. A battered rack and an ingot table display forging supplies.

node.name: Barbarian Guild, Great Hall
node.description: A musty dampness pervades this cavernous room, and a faint salt breeze flutters down from a gaping hole in the roof where decades of neglect have caused the weathered beams to collapse. Faint smudges of paint on the peeling plaster walls evidence the prior existence of proud frescoes, but all that now remains is the occasional hint of a sword arm raised in combat, and the grimace of a dying warrior disembodied from his once-glorious likeness.

The benighted city's low murmur drifts down from a ragged aperture in the roof of this vast chamber, and shadows shudder from torches ranged around the peeling plaster walls. Water drips persistently from some unseen source, forming shallow pools on the worn flagstone floor before seeping silently through the cracks into the porous rock beneath.

node.name: Barbarian Guild, Dormitory
node.description: Numerous poky cells line one wall of this dim hallway. A half-hearted attempt at decorating the place has been made at some stage -- probably many years ago, judging by the greyish tone of the paint and the chipped and peeling plaster. Underfoot, the flagstones are worn into a smooth groove where many feet have trodden.

node.name: Barbarian Guild, Pit Gallery
node.description: Descending some fifteen feet into semi-darkness, a circular pit rimmed by low iron railings commands much of the room's floorspace -- little more than a narrow ledge of standing room remains around the edge of the sunken arena. Scrawled in faded chalk across the chipped plaster on the far wall, a crude sign declares the Pit Rules.

node.name: Barbarian Guild, Death Slab
node.description: A single slab of chiseled black granite forms a low dais spanning the breadth of this forlorn anteroom. Glistening treacherously underfoot, the blood of the vanquished coagulates in blackish pools across the stone's cragged expanse, while the rhythmic drip of chilly water echoes forlornly in the gloom.

node.name: Paedraig's Pawn
node.description: Cracked glass doors block access to the cluttered shelves which line the walls of the shop. A thin film of oily dirt covers everything in the room, leaving a repulsively tacky finish which clings to boots and sandals with each step across the grimy floor. The burly figure of the owner stands behind the counter, half-hidden by the shadows which fill the area.

node.name: Mother Magpie's Gems and Metals
node.description: A thin film of grease and dust vies with the cobwebs to cover the floor and counter in the tiny shop. Old Mother Magpie is a familiar character to residents of the area commonly known as 'Tog Town. Dealing in gems and precious metals, rumor has it she also sponsors a band of street rats who bring her some of her... rarer items.

node.name: MAMAS Company, Ratha Branch
node.description: Small, dark, and dust-filled, the room is lit only by one ceiling-hung lantern that seems not to have been cleaned in some time. Piles of rocks lie scattered in corners and on the scratched and stained counter, sorted by color or weight, or in some cases, by whim. A frayed map is mounted on the wall behind a hanging set of curiously dust-free scales.

node.name: Old Rat's Tavern
node.description: This open air porch looks to have been constructed by drunken Halflings. Every plank of the deck creaks loudly. The stoop sags low, making many a customer duck their head. Benches on either side of the tavern's swinging doors give people a place to sit when it gets too hot inside.

node.name: Old Rat's Tavern
node.description: The bar's taproom has sawdust covered floors and dirty wood planks for walls. Flies swarm around open ale casks and piles of trash. A dirty counter is piled with unwashed ceramic mugs and tin cups. Stools are set up around a few beat-up tables.

node.name: Old Rat's Tavern, Back Room
node.description: The back room is falling apart along with the rest of the tavern. Dirty wooden planks atop battered crates are the only seats, besides the floor. A group of ragged S'Kra Mur throw daggers at the vermin which infest the shadows of the room.

node.name: Old Rat's Tavern
node.description: A lone table, propped under one leg with a wad of paper, sits under a hanging black iron lantern. Rough wooden chairs with unidentifiable stains on the seats are scattered about, most of them covered in half-empty glasses and the knocked-out ashes from pipes.

node.name: Old Rat's Tavern
node.description: This room is full of empty crates and barrels. A number of dead rats lay among the other refuse. The sour smell of ale gone bad fills the air.

node.name: Old Rat's Tavern
node.description: Boxes and crates are stacked up solidly against the walls, and it appears that in places, they may be all that stands between you and the harbor. The rough planks and logs from which the room was built seem to be random driftwood that has washed ashore and been scavenged for use as building materials.

node.name: Old Rat's Tavern
node.description: The roof slants down sharply, almost reaching to the floor on one side, showing that this room has been created by the simple expedient of leaning planks against the building and knocking out the wall leading to the tap room. The ever-present breeze off the harbor whistles through the gaps in the walls, creating background music for the more raucous cries of the patrons.

node.name: Lower Bank of Ratha, Portico
node.description: The massive slate roof of the bank overhangs the wide entrance, forming a welcome pool of shade on hot days. A pair of well-armed guards lean on wicked-looking tridents, while cold ophidian eyes watch every person carefully.

The massive slate roof of the bank overhangs the wide entrance, forming a deep pool of shade relieved by a pair of bronze and crystal flambeaux half again as tall as an Elothean. A quartet of well-armed guards lean on wicked-looking tridents, while their cold ophidian eyes watch every person carefully. The doors are open to the night and the energetic sounds of commerce waft out from within.

node.name: Lower Bank of Ratha, Atrium
node.description: A wide expanse of cool sea-foam green marble stretches across this noble room. Far overhead, crystal panes set within a spidery framework of gilded wrought-iron provide ample light that seems to intensify every color. Lofty arches on three sides lead to the various banking departments: The Bursar for foreign currency exchange, the Cashiers for regular banking transactions and the Bourse for private sales.

A wide expanse of cool sea-foam green marble stretches across this noble room. Far overhead, crystal panes set within a spidery framework of gilded wrought iron provide ample light that in daytime, will flood the room with brightness. Lofty arches on three sides lead to the various banking departments: The Bursar for foreign currency exchange, the Cashiers for regular banking transactions and the Bourse for private sales.

node.name: Lower Bank of Ratha, Currency Exchange
node.description: The soft jingle of coins mixes with the sharp click of an abacus being rapidly worked. A low counter separates customers from the moneychangers and a brisk business ensues at all hours. Cool efficiency suffuses each transaction and there is little or no exchange of courtesies or bonhomie beyond the minimum necesary to complete the task at hand.

node.name: Lower Bank of Ratha, Auction Bourse
node.description: This large room has been set aside by the bank for those wishing to do business among themselves and to prevent the regular transactions from being disrupted. Heavy velvet drapes line the walls and a thick carpet covers the normally bare marble floor to muffle the sound of buying and selling and the not-infrequent disputes that arise over same.

node.name: Lower Bank of Ratha, Cashier
node.description: Pale buff marble walls frame an equally bland beige counter where cold-eyed tellers process transactions with a plentitude of speed and accuracy but a notable lack of warmth or attempts at false friendship common to other such institutions. Business is the order of the day and that which interferes has no place in these cool and efficient chambers of commerce.

node.name: Sisters-in-Lore, Herbal and Alchemical Supplies
node.description: A fire crackles merrily in a cast iron stove mounted in an alcove along the rear wall of the shop. The remaining walls are covered with shelves lined with colorful glass bottles and vials. Dozens of cloth bags hang from hooks attached to the rafters, each of which gives off a distinctive fragrance. Two elderly S'Kra Mur women dressed in identical enveloping black robes potter about the shop, occupied with their daily routine.

node.name: Sisters-in-Lore, Shallow Nook
node.description: This comfortable nook is located off to one side of the main shop. A stained-glass lamp burns atop an old-fashioned ball and claw foot table, and a comfortable (though rather tattered) chair sits beside it. Shelves line the walls of the nook, filled with books on healing and alchemy.

node.name: Ratha, Carousel Square
node.description: A massive conical building rises from the cobbles at the square's center, its snowy alabaster surfaces gleaming brilliantly. A sparkling mosaic of coral and turquoise set above an oval doorway reads "THE CAROUSEL."

node.name: Ratha, The Carousel
node.description: Exotic tapestries of every possible description drape the wall ringing the Carousel's core. A circular roof supports a vast framework of iron and timbers rising to the building's apex. Countless gears, pulleys and weights within the structure form the strikingly complex and beautiful mechanism which drives the Carousel.

node.name: Ratha, Carousel Desk
node.description: A long wooden desk spans the width of the western wall. Brass lanterns hang from the ceiling, and the floor behind the desk is covered in spotless red tile.

node.name: Uasin Dock, Port of Ratha
node.description: This dock is as sturdy and well-made as the others in the city, but has been painted a garish peacock blue, oddly out of place against the stark canvas and weathered wood of the rest of the area.
This dock, as well made as the others in the city, is painted a garish peacock blue. Workers, dressed in dark clothing, rush about loading and unloading ships.

node.name: Ratha Traders' Guild, Reception
node.description: A jewel-toned carpet covers the floor of this cozy office, giving it a cheerful quality despite its cramped quarters. Teak paneling surrounds the room, supporting a rich exhibit of wall displays by local artists. A curved corner desk dominates the room, manned by the guild secretary, and directly across from it sits a brocade-cushioned bench. Just to the side of the desk is an arch that leads to the hallway, the faint noise of workers beyond.

node.name: Ratha Trader Market, Port of Call
node.description: Murals depicting busy ports cover each of the walls, while arches artistically painted as the entrances to shops lead to the other rooms. Brightly lit silver-plated lanterns hang from the ceiling. Four tables are set corner to corner resulting in a diamond shape in the center of the room.

node.name: Ratha Trader Market, Country Faire
node.description: Vibrantly-colored silk swatches drape from a center point in the ceiling out to its edges like the inside of a festive tent. Murals of crowds visiting country faires cover each of the walls. Tall torches in each corner provide light to the tables that line the floor.

node.name: Ratha Trader Market, Market Day
node.description: A busy marketplace with brightly festooned stalls is depicted in a running mural that spans from wall to wall. The ceiling has been painted in shades of blue with fluffy, white clouds. Brass-plated lanterns set in each corner shine brightly on the tables set towards each wall.

node.name: Ratha Trader Market, City Streets
node.description: Painted onto each wall is a running mural of a bustling city street, complete with hawkers on the corners, pushcarts, and children playing with hoops and balls. Lanterns hang on bronze hooks as part of the scene and throw a constant light on the tables that are pushed into the center of the room.

node.name: Onsuwayo's Clinic, Foyer
node.description: A pair of benches flank the white-tiled hallway that feeds patients into and out of the tidy clinic. A stringent odor fills the air and triggers painful memories of other visits to similar places and the associated pain (and expense). The few people waiting on the benches seem indisposed to chat, some being busy bleeding all over the tile floor or engaged in other matters of a similarly upsetting nature.

node.name: Onsuwayo's Clinic, Dispensary
node.description: Moans, groans, screams and the keening of still-conscious beings undergoing excruciating pain and terror emanate from three treatment rooms that open off this rotunda. The air is cold and heavy with nervous tension overlaid with the stench of blood and the sharp, astringent odors of medicines. Several coldly efficient S'Kra direct the entire facility, dispensing minor first aid, directing people to treatment rooms and arranging supplies for the harried surgeons.

node.name: Onsuwayo's Clinic, Empath's Lounge
node.description: Set on the roof of the clinic, this comfortable room is meant as a retreat for the staff and for visiting Healers. One side opens out onto a small but well-tended roof garden where many herbs and useful plants are grown. Inside, several comfortable chairs and sofas await the weary and work-worn.

node.name: Onsuwayo's Clinic, Roof Garden
node.description: An oasis of green in a city of barren stone and rock, this garden holds a concentrated subset of the many herbs and plants needed to refresh the working Empath. Built by a master, the small space mimics a wild environment, with plants growing in a seeming haphazard fashion amongst their natural brethren. Tall plantings hide the view of the town and mitigate the chill, damp sea winds.

node.name: Onsuwayo's Clinic, Treatment Room One
node.description: Several cots and pallets await the sick and wounded. Cold white tile and chill stone floors make the environment clean but lacking in warmth. Even the cots are a bleached white. The only trace of color in the room is a thick spray of blood on the wall, each drop sparkling in the glaring light like a ruby. The sight is less than reassuring.

node.name: Onsuwayo's Clinic, Treatment Room Two
node.description: Someone has recently died a messy death here. The walls and even the ceiling are festooned with thick streamers of drying blood. One cot is soaked with the crimson spew and everyone else awaiting treatment edges away from it as if it were a leper at a wedding feast. A harried looking drudge is mopping ineffectually at a coagulating puddle of grue in the middle of the room.

node.name: Onsuwayo's Clinic, Treatment Room Three
node.description: This room appears to hold the failures of the clinic's work. Several shrouded forms lie stacked on metal shelves along the back wall next to a stone table that angles down to a large drain. One dim sconce is the only light source, and the changing, flickering light makes the shrouded forms seem to waver or move.

node.name: Furrier's Shop
node.description: Untanned skins lie piled atop each other on the floor, while cured leather stretches in wooden frames hung upon the walls. Surly Gor'Tog laborers toil away, using large paddles to turn the skins soaking in the vats. The proprieter of the tannery looks on from his spot behind the counter.

node.name: Imble's Ironworks, Receiving Docks
node.description: Stepping through the large doorway, you enter a cavernous building. Rife with smoke and heat, the thought occurs to turn and seek the freshness of the air outside the door. Three crumbling stone steps lead into a room, illuminated brightly by the blazing foundry. Enormous carts filled with rocks and dirt are queued, waiting to be transported along the tracks toward the inferno beyond.

node.name: Imble's Ironworks, Foundry
node.description: Burning every moment of every day, the great fires of the foundry generate enormous heat. Giant bellows and cooling fans, operated by the teams of burly slaves, assist the smiths in creating the famous anchors. Though master craftsman abound in this shop, Imble himself is always willing to give the interested visitor a sound lesson in taming the molten iron ore.

node.name: Ratha, Narrow Alley off Kssintlee Way
node.description: A narrow alley runs along the back of Jack Tarr's Rest, passing by a peeling wooden door. From the fragrant aromas, this must lead to the kitchens. Chittering noises echo through the area as red-eyed rats dart out of sight. At the end of the alley, a wooden bin stands before a ramshackle old wall, overflowing with trash awaiting disposal.

node.name: Jack Tarr's Rest, Porch
node.description: Traders gather on the porch of the inn, sipping mugs of ale and puffing at carved bone pipes as they discuss their latest successes or bemoan the loss of a venture. A bench swing rocks back and forth with a creaking noise as the chains rub against the hooks in the ceiling, and a pleasant breeze from the sea carries with it the sharp tang of saltwater.

node.name: Jack Tarr's Rest, Front Hall
node.description: The walls of the foyer are covered with stippled whitewashed plaster and polished teak wainscotting. A brass bell sits atop the front desk. From the dents and scratches in the metal, it sees much use as patrons demand service from a harried-looking clerk. A hallway leads east toward the stairs, while sounds of merriment echo from the nearby common room where guests can enjoy a snack or meal at any time of the day.

node.name: Jack Tarr's Rest, Back Hall
node.description: Exposed oak beams, darkened with smoke and age, crisscross the whitewashed plaster ceiling of the hallway. The scent of fish wafts from the door of the nearby kitchen, where a cook can be heard berating a hapless assistant. Seascapes and pictures of sailing ships line the walls, while dark oak stairs lead up to the second floor.

node.name: Jack Tarr's Rest, Private Parlor
node.description: The private parlor is quieter than the common room, providing the more fastidious guests a place to retreat from the noise and jostling of the crowd. A polished mahogany table nearly fills the room, surrounded by captain's chairs pulled neatly under the edge of the varnished surface. A fire crackling in the hearth makes this a cozy place for guests to relax. Seascapes and pictures of various ships are scattered along the paneled walls.

node.name: Jack Tarr's Rest, Kitchen
node.description: Copper kettles and cast iron pans hang from hooks embedded in the exposed oak beams which run along the ceiling. Minyi Barberry, a portly Halfling woman, manages the kitchens of the inn, her wooden ladle sending fear into the hearts of the scullery maids as they scamper to do her bidding. Brick ovens built into the walls give off an aroma of baked breads, and fish grills over an open fire on the stove.

node.name: Jack Tarr's Rest, Upstairs Hall
node.description: A narrow table stands at the northern end of the long upstairs hallway. Above the table, vases filled with creamy white starflowers hang on either side of a painting of the late Josiah Jack Tarr. Black gauze draped above the painting trails down to pool in soft heaps upon the floor. Nearby, darkened oak stairs spiral down to the first floor.

node.name: Jack Tarr's Rest, Upstairs Hall
node.description: A red and gold runner covers the dark oak floorboards of the hallway, the colors vivid against the polished wood. The gilded frames of the paintings which hang on the whitewashed walls gleam dully in the light. Each painting depicts a ship on which Captain Josiah Tarr had served before his unfortunate death at sea. A trapdoor in the ceiling leads up to the widow's walk on the top of the inn.

node.name: Jack Tarr's Rest, Upstairs Hall
node.description: A painting of Magda Tarr, the wife of Captain Josiah Tarr, hangs above a narrow table at the southern end of the hallway. A sour-faced Halfling woman, the painter has captured her expression perfectly, frozen in a perpetual glare at her husband's picture to the north. Rumor has it that one of the incentives behind Captain Jack's many sea voyages was the lengthy time it gave him away from his wife.

node.name: Jack Tarr's Rest, Sandpiper's Chamber
node.description: Carved wooden figures of seabirds are scattered on shelves mounted on the pale green walls of the room. A carved maple bed is covered with a vibrant yellow and white quilt in the tall ships pattern, and a few brightly colored throw rugs are scattered across the floor. Leather chairs stand on either side of an open window, providing a comfortable place to sit and talk after a long journey.

node.name: Jack Tarr's Rest, Oceancaller's Chambers
node.description: Pale shades of color, identical to those seen in the fairest of sunsets, are lavishly painted on the walls. In the center of this illusory twilight is a large couch, flanked by two nightstands, each covered with brilliantly tinted bottles. It is within the bottle's glassy surfaces that light is reflected, sending a shower of prismatic spots across the heavy iron tub that rests in the corner.

node.name: Jack Tarr's Rest, Surfskimmer's Chamber
node.description: Comfortable blue chairs stand on either side of a smoke-stained brick fireplace. Above the mantle is a picture of a swept-masted coaster. The name on the bow identifies the vessel as the Surfskimmer. In the corner of the room is a polished oak bed covered by a colorful velvet and silk crazy quilt.

node.name: Jack Tarr's Rest, Seasinger's Chamber
node.description: Lace curtains move gently in the breeze from an open window overlooking the street below. The walls of the room are painted a pale shade of amber with a soft gold glaze sponged on to give it a dappled effect. A captain's bed stands on one side of the room, with a cheerful blue and green sister's choice quilt spread across the mattress. On the other side of the room, a pair of leather chairs stand on either side of a low table.

node.name: Jack Tarr's Rest, Mistwalker's Chamber
node.description: The sea blue walls of the tiny chamber have been sponge-painted with a lighter color, making them appear to shift like the mist rising over the harbor on an autumn morning. A wide four-poster bed covered with a mariner's compass quilt and piled high with cushions nearly fills the room, leaving just enough space for a comfortable reading chair beside the nightstand.

node.name: Jack Tarr's Rest, Windrunner's Chamber
node.description: A wide brass bed with a lace coverlet and frilly pillows nearly fills the tiny chamber. Beside the bed, a crystal vase filled with an arrangement of rosebuds stands atop a nightstand. An intricately woven carpet covers the floor, muffling the sounds from the common room below.

node.name: Jack Tarr's Rest, Wavedancer's Chamber
node.description: A vibrant floral carpet covers the polished oak floorboards of the tiny chamber. The colors of the carpet are echoed in the quilted coverlet atop the dark oak sleigh bed. The quilt, a traditional storm at sea pattern, was at one time believed to be a binding spell to protect those it sheltered from Drogor's anger.

node.name: Jack Tarr's Rest, Common Room
node.description: Waitresses carrying trays laden with food and drink make their way through the closely packed tables which fill the darkened common room. The floor is sticky from spills, and the candles' illumination is fitful at best, yet none of that seems to affect the patrons' enjoyment. A group of rowdies give catcalls and whistles of appreciation as a bard performs a slightly bawdy song in the corner.

node.name: Jack Tarr's Rest, Darkened Corner
node.description: A wooden booth dominates this corner of the common room, its surface scarred by hundreds of brawls and warped by spilled ale. A seedy Halfling sits at the booth, clutching a mug of some dark liquid in his hand.

node.name: Antellius' Weapons Training
node.description: The scents of old sweat and dried blood have been worked into the wooden floor of the salle with the passage of time. Hundreds of students have walked these polished boards, their skills ranging from inept to masterful. Blademaster Antellius, the school's patron and head teacher, stands in one corner of the room, appraising his students.

node.name: Odalva Reach, Meadow Park
node.description: Hidden from the traffic of the road and the trail, this spot is a favorite for just enjoying the sun and the quiet of the meadow. A little brook works its way through grass and stone.

node.name: Odalva Reach, Meadow Park
node.description: Birdsong and sweets smells highlight the lovely trail into the urban meadow. Amidst the turmoil and chaos of the city, this meadow affords the average citizen a chance to enjoy the beauty and peacefulness of the outdoors without the long journey to the outskirts of town.

node.name: Odalva Reach, Meadow Park
node.description: The trail winds haphazardly here, through the gentle dale and along a low driftwood fence. Sounds of splashing and laughter echo from just beyond a gentle hummock to the west. A large, draping Sana'ati tree blocks the path as if awaiting a visit from a much loved companion.

node.name: Sana'ati Tree, Low Hanging Branch
node.description: The large branch here is broad and flat, well worn by many hours of comfortable repose. Enveloping the branch, a canopy of leaves forms the walls of a large room. Overhead, a sturdy limb leads out toward equally intriguing cubby holes.

node.name: Sana'ati Tree, Upper Limb
node.description: Refreshing breezes blow through the upper limbs of the great tree. A well worn crook tells of many happy hours sitting and enjoying the arboreal hideaway. Just above, a frayed rope descends from some upper reach of the tree, disappearing through a gap in the foliage.

node.name: Sana'ati Tree, Bird's Nest Lookout
node.description: A panoramic view from this spot takes the breath away. The meadow, lush and rolling appears as a soft blanket, the pond just beyond the tree shimmers with reflected light. The most dramatic, however, is the view of the sparkling crystal ocean, as far as the eye can see. Through the curtain of leaves and branches a deep pool sparkles an invitation, a giant rope swing can be seen just below, hanging from an outstretched branch.

node.name: Elepaio's Luthierre
node.description: Birds twitter from wicker cages hung about the interior of the tiny music shop. Their cheerful song fills the air with a perpetual melody, accompanying the singing of the Master Luthier, Elepaio, as she toils over her work.

node.name: The Raven's Mask and Leatherworks, Sales Room
node.description: Display cases holding leather armor and masks fill much of this tiny shop, but one corner is set up as a comfortable nook beside the stove. An overstuffed chair sits beside the fire, occupied by a brightly garbed young Halfling man. The noise of a hammer on metal may be heard from the nearby work room, along with an occasional muffled curse.

node.name: Krrikt'k's Forge, Salesroom
node.description: Deep red silk hangings fall in graceful folds along the walls, softening the stark lines of the tiny shop. Mounted along the walls are samples of Mastersmith Krrikt'k's work, the polished steel reflecting the deep red glow of the fabric. A dark oak counter stands at the center of the lamp-lit display room, bearing a brass-trimmed leather catalog with a list of the items available for sale.

node.name: Ratha, Vacant Lot
node.description: A decrepit fence surrounds the bare earth inside this vacant plot, its weathered slats often rotten or missing entirely. Deeply worn into the otherwise featureless earth, a wide rut leads westward to disappear between two buildings on the other side of the lot.

node.name: Ratha, Bosun's Lane
node.description: The bumpy street stretches north and west, while to the east the cobblestones have been upturned by the roots of a pair of bloodwood trees, leaving only dirt marred by the occasional cracked stone. Rotten wooden shutters hang precariously from the panes of ramshackle houses lining the road, and the faint sound of moving water can be heard to the west.

node.name: Ratha, Upturned Ironwood
node.description: The cobbled street ends abruptly at a hole left by the fall of a massive ironwood. The thick trunk has been chopped off, leaving only an upturned root ball extending from the recess. Thick mud has filled the hole and now fosters dense growths of marsh plants.

node.name: Ratha, Bosun's Lane
node.description: Abandoned houses line the broken street, shutters and doors hanging precariously from rusted hinges. Round stones, stacked in a pyramid formation, sit in the doorway of one of the ruined buildings. A large wooden barricade spans the width of the street, blocking further passage north.

node.name: Ratha, Zsikiel Monument
node.description: Tourists lounge under the monument's marble arches, enjoying the shade and the marvelous carvings on the memorial's columns. The artwork depicts many points of Ratha's military history, particularly battles in which members of the Zsikiel family played an important role.

node.name: Ratha, Zsikiel Monument
node.description: An immense memorial arch looms high across the alleyway. Built by the merchant guilds of Ratha, the monument is a testament to the military achievements and patriotic sacrifices of the Zsikiel family. The street does not bypass this feat of architecture but actually runs under its sweeping columns.

node.name: Ratha, Puudu Alley
node.description: This part of the alley must run adjacent to some craft hall, because a number of barrels, filled with an assortment of scrap materials, line the side of the street. Cured leather, pulped wood, and heated iron are the most prevalent scents that fill the air, all with the underlying aroma of mold and rust that comes from sitting out in the weather too long.

node.name: Ratha, Puudu Alley
node.description: Many owners of the nearby buildings seem to use the alley as an open trash barrel. Piles of refuse further impede those that travel this route, and few fail to leave the area without smelling a bit worse than when they entered.

node.name: Ratha, Puudu Alley
node.description: The backsides of a number of shops and homes close in this road from both sides, throwing everything into shadows. Traffic is thin, as most prefer the wide thoroughfares to the claustrophobic and perhaps more dangerous alleyway. A few citizens still brave the passage, keeping a wary eye on all who pass near.

node.name: Ratha, Bazaar
node.description: Roiling with festive chaos, the walkways of this multicultural bazaar are lined with colorful pennants, and crowded with milling shoppers from every corner of Elanthia. Music, laughter, strange dialects and foreign tongues fill the air as merchants strike deals on everything from the finest raiment and precious gems to the most mundane of household staples. Packs of impatient children stop to gaze hungrily at the latest in edible delicacies on display.

node.name: The Raven's Mask and Leatherworks, Workroom
node.description: Fragrant piles of cured leather lie stacked about the tiny workroom, the aroma mingling with the scent of melted beeswax used to stiffen the leather for armor. An almost half-finished leather mask sits upon the workbench, and several pieces of armor in various states of repair are heaped upon a table. In the center of the room, a young Halfling woman perches upon a wooden stool, her nimble fingers flying as she puts the finishing touches on her current project.

node.name: Krrikt'k's Forge
node.description: No wood lines the walls of the forge, just massive stone blocks to reduce the risk of fire. In the center, coals glow within a beehive-shaped furnace, the flames fanned by a leather bellows. Apprentices work at their craft -- a tall dark-scaled youth hammers out a dent in greaves, a younger lass works on steel rings for chainmail, yet another smoothes nicks in the edge of a broadsword. Overseeing them all, the Mastersmith works at his own anvil.

node.name: Ratha Bait and Tackle
node.description: Built from pieces of wood scavenged from shipwrecks, the bait shop creaks and groans in time to the gentle waves of the harbor. Three relatively flat boards placed across two barrels form a rough counter, and other barrels, old hogsheads, and rough boxes are scattered haphazardly around the room. Judging by the smell, the shop handles a wide variety of baits and fishing supplies.

node.name: Magical Art, Thuyza's Tattoo Place
node.description: The incessant droning of the crowds outside is hardly dulled by the rickety structure. Attempts to mend the numerous rotted holes in the wood are evident, and many of the attempted fixes display signs of being patched as well. From time to time, an errant beggar will peek through the door, only to have Thuyza hurl the nearest empty ink bottle in his or her face.

node.name: Shore Walk, Rubble
node.description: The crevice widens to become a long channel of high-walled stone. Stalks of dune grass push through the broken shells and splintered rock which clutter the sandy floor. Faint impressions, barely recognizable as footprints, head off to the northwest.

node.name: Shore Walk, Shack
node.description: A tiny shack shoulders against the rocky wall at the back of the channel. Thatched with sea oats, and constructed of vine-lashed driftwood embedded in mounds of stone and shells, the structure looks too frail to withstand the weather or offer much shelter. A piece of scrap canvas hanging crookedly from a break in the driftwood serves as a door.

node.name: Hermit's Shack
node.description: Ocean debris and the remains of ill-fated vessels washed ashore furnish the shack. There are signs of recent occupancy, but nobody is currently home. Whoever the resident is, his needs are simple: a table, a chair, and a set of shelves to display his homemade treasures.

node.name: Shore Walk, Cliffs
node.description: Seaweed and algae coating the rocks make footing on the uneven surfaces even more treacherous. Cracked shells lie scattered about, seemingly out of place, at this height above the tide line. The stone mounds offshore reach toward the high slab ridges, further confusing where land ends and ocean begins.

node.name: Shore Walk, Cliffs
node.description: The cliff edge drops abruptly, plunging vertically into the ocean far below. Frothy waves crash against the rocky footings. Farther downshore, a thin band of sand reappears, hugging the cliffs as they wind northward. The sea stretches east, unbroken to the curved blue-grey horizon.

node.name: Captain Namazzi's Ship Goods
node.description: The scent of sea air drifts through the gaps of the wooden plank walls of this dilapidated shop. The windows have become covered with a dark grimy film from years of neglect giving everything within a shade of brown. Heavily laden shelves crowded with goods for the seafaring adventurer hang precariously from their mounts along the walls. Disorganized tables crammed together create a maze of aisles.

node.name: Paganell's Carpets
node.description: Barely visible rays of moonlight filter through mirrored tubes to bathe the sandy floor of the tiny cavern. Colorful carpets hang along the walls, softening the black stone surfaces. In the center of the room, a young weaver works at a loom, creating an oval carpet in a jewel toned medallion design.

node.name: Dennats Baya
node.description: Black laquered cabinets line the walls of the shop, their open fronts displaying an assortment of hair care items ranging from razors to combs. A small catalog rests on a marble counter that stretches from one end of the room to another. Tiny iron smoke pots, perched on brass tripods in the corners, are giving off a strong odor from the incense burning within.

node.name: Amorand the Tailor
node.description: Clothing in the traditional colors of Ratha's ruling families is displayed on mannequins atop the counters scattered about the shop. An open door in the base of one cabinet reveals bolts of fabric stacked in neat rows beneath the counters.

node.name: The Golden Heron Inn, Entry Hall
node.description: This sparsely decorated room leads into the interior of the inn. Lamps hung on the walls illuminate a dirty carpet.

node.name: The Golden Heron Inn, Bar
node.description: Crystal lamps hang from the ceiling of the bar, illuminating the room with rainbow sparkles of light. The walls are paneled with varnished oak. Soft music can be heard coming from the other rooms of the inn. A long counter is set up in the middle of the room, with an elegantly lettered menu hanging behind it.

node.name: The Golden Heron Inn, Dance Hall
node.description: The high ceiling has a crystal chandelier hanging from its center. Tables circle the hall's wood-tiled floor, leaving a large area open for couples to dance. Soft music is being pumped into the room from some unseen place. The walls are covered with festive tapestries.

node.name: The Golden Heron Inn, Dance Stage
node.description: This room is dominated by a large stage. The only illumination for the area are the lights set up along the foot of the stage. A few chairs are lined up on the floor for the audience's comfort.

node.name: The Golden Heron Inn, Corridor
node.description: The brightly lit hallway ends in a staircase that leads to the second floor. A beautifully painted portrait hangs on the wood-paneled wall. Music from other parts of the inn can be heard as soft background noise. The air smells of freshly cut flowers.

node.name: The Golden Heron Inn, Parlor
node.description: The room is painted a soft indigo and hung with shaded lamps. A comfortable looking couch rests against one wall. Thick carpeting, woven with a intricate design, covers the floor.

node.name: The Golden Heron Inn, Upstairs Corridor
node.description: Crystal lamps hung from the ceiling illuminate the hallway. A staircase on one end of the hall leads back down to the main floor of the inn. An intricately woven tapestry hangs the length of one wall while four doors are spaced evenly along the other.

node.name: The Golden Heron Inn, Common Room
node.description: This room smells of unwashed clothes and bedding in need of a good airing out. A number of pallets are thrown about on the floor, leaving little room to move about. Shaded lamps provide a small bit of illumination for the chamber. The walls, once white, have faded to a dingy grey.

node.name: The Golden Heron Inn, Dragon Room
node.description: A black lacquered bed, carved with gold dragons, sits in the center of the room. The walls, one of which is completely covered by a large tapestry, are painted a dark blue. Dragon statues stand in every corner of the room with small lamps held in their mouths to illuminate the chamber.

node.name: The Golden Heron Inn, Rose Room
node.description: The sweet smell of roses fills this room, coming from a number of vases full of freshly cut flowers. A huge four-poster bed, draped with silken veils, fills up most of the chamber. The walls are painted a soft pink with a rose-motif design. All of the room's wood molding is beautifully carved with roses and leafy vines.

node.name: The Golden Heron Inn, Gold Room
node.description: The walls are painted a soft gold and hung with silky drapes. A great oak bed, varnished a golden brown, takes up the greater portion of the room. Large vases, veneered with gold leaf, are filled with beautiful yellow tulips that fill the air with a sweet scent.

node.name: Meadow Park, Babbling Brook
node.description: Gurgling happily past, the delightful little brook cuts a path through the rolling meadow. A small stone bench at the eastern edge of the brook offers the weary a chance to sit and dip their feet in the whirling water.

node.name: Meadow Park, Babbling Brook
node.description: Cool and refreshing, the water here runs clear. Looking closely, small fish can be seen swimming along upstream toward the quiet pools of the pond beyond.

node.name: Odalva Reach, Meadow Park
node.description: In the shadow of the great Sana'ati, the meadow here is cool and fragrant. The sounds of playful activity at the pond and the babbling of a little brook nearby infuse the area with an atmosphere of carefree innocence.

node.name: Meadow Park, Shallow Pond
node.description: Surrounded by tall grasses, and a sandy embankment, this pond is barely visible from the trail. Opening out toward the west, the shallow watering hole is perfectly oval and tended to by a motherly weeping willow. The pond is protected from the wind of the bluff, making a perfect reflection possible on a calm day.

node.name: Shallow Pond, In the Water
node.description: Quiet and reflective or wild and splashing, the pond serves many purposes for the inhabitants of the neighborhood. Clear and surprisingly warm, the water is silky to the touch and about waist high for a human and surrounded by a sandy embankment. At the eastern end of the pond is a clear, deep pool perfect for diving.

node.name: Shallow Pond, Deep Pool
node.description: The pool here is very deep, surrounded by large boulders and tall grass along a steep bank. Warmed by an underground hot spring, the water is soothing and delightful. Hanging just out of reach, a large rope swing is suspended from the upper branches of the large sana'ati tree in the meadow just beyond the pond.

node.name: Deep Pool, Sandy Shore
node.description: Pebbles and smooth sand line the shoreline. Several old logs have been placed strategically along the edge of the water. Swimmers stop to rest and watch the divers plummet into the water from the giant tree above or lurch out into the deep pool on the incredible rope swing.

node.name: Ratha, High Guardhouse
node.description: Marked by mud, bread crumbs, and apple peels, this guardhouse is the epitome of filthy. If the high guard runs inspections, it obviously missed this post.

node.name: Ratha, Carousel Booth
node.description: A polished steel lever protrudes from the eastern wall of the small, ebony-panelled room, flanking a steel door to the north.

arc.move: pull lever; go door; open vault; look in vault

node.name: Ratha, Carousel Chamber
node.description: A sturdy vault, set in the back wall, stands ready for your use. The floor is covered by a soft thick carpet of deep red, and the walls are paneled in polished gold pine. Looking at the back wall, you notice a tiny gap between it and the rest of the room.

node.name: Barbarian Guild, Dormitory
node.description: The uppermost stair on a short flight of stone steps has been worn down so far over the years that it forms a semi-circular well reaching halfway across the corridor. Along one wall, mismatched doors lead into the private rooms of the Guild's local members, each small cell no larger than a walk-in closet.

node.name: Barbarian Guild, Dormitory
node.description: The ceiling sags precariously overhead, bulging downward as if bowed by a great weight of water, although the air is dry and dusty. A warm draft swells inexplicably from beneath the splintered floorboards, which creak and groan in protest at the lack of care shown them by generations of inattentive residents.

node.name: Barbarian Guild, Dormitory
node.description: The corridor ends abruptly beneath a grimy skylight, which contributes little either to the illumination or the view in this stuffy attic. A breath of hot, dry air buoys particles of choking dust around the dead end, as the strident grind of industry clanks from somewhere below.

node.name: Barbarian Guild, Dormitory
node.description: A few torches strung unevenly along one wall of the narrow corridor cast little more than a glum flicker of light across the patchy plasterwork and loose floorboards. Muffled scratches and squeaks issue forth from a deep cavity beneath the greyed oak planks.

node.name: Barbarian Guild, Savage Pit
node.description: The air is thick with the stench of sweat and blood inside this deep, barrel-shaped enclosure. Underfoot, a cloying layer of sludgy sand carpets the cramped arena and crusts in stinking clumps around the base of the circular wooden wall. Countless brown stains and splintered pockmarks scar the iron-banded palisade.

node.name: Grimbly's Forge, Entryway
node.description: This passage acts as an entryway in and out of the forge. Stifling heat marches up from a large hall to the south, nearly destroying a subtle cross-breeze heading east and west. To the north, a thick iron door protects the outside office from the smothering heat.

node.name: Grimbly's Forge, East Passage
node.description: A gentle breeze stirs in this passage, adding a bit of relief to the blistering heat. To the east are two open entryways, leading out to grindstones.

node.name: Grimbly's Forge, West Passage
node.description: The small side passage offers some protection from the heat, making the temperature tolerable. Two entrances lead to rooms on the west end, one streaked with oily handprints and one that has been haphazardly scrubbed down. Beyond the oily entrance, you can hear the high-pitched song of grinding metal.

node.name: Grimbly's Forge, Brick Hall
node.description: Soot-stained red brick makes up the walls and floor of this large hall. Other than a scrap bin placed at the south wall, the hall is otherwise unfurnished. On the west wall are three archways, through which the sound of pounding metal can be heard. On the east wall are three doorways, blackened with coal dust.

node.name: Grimbly's Forge, Foundry
node.description: Eerie shadows dance on the walls across the smudged doorway that leads out of the foundry. A huge iron crucible hangs over the fire, suspended by heavy chains from a thick wooden beam. Lying in wait within reach of the sparking embers are the arms of the bellows, ready to gulp up air and feed the ravenous flames. Black dust fills the air, spiraling up in the heat as it blows off a pile of coal. Molds for ingots, plate and wire line the inner walls.

node.name: Grimbly's Forge, Foundry
node.description: The floor slopes toward a circular firepit fed by a large pile of crushed coal. A huge iron crucible hangs over the fire, suspended by heavy chains from a thick wooden beam. A leather bellows lies close at hand, while stone molds of various sizes and shapes, waiting to be filled, line the far wall. The only exit is a blackened doorway to the west.

node.name: Grimbly's Forge, Foundry
node.description: A huge iron crucible sways from a blackened beam in the center of the foundry. Molds for ingots, plate and wire lie in wait underneath the far end of the crucible, while the large arms of the bellows and immense coal pile are placed in convenient reach. A sooty doorway leads back into the hall.

node.name: Grimbly's Forge, Break Room
node.description: This is a small, simple room set up to act as a break room for people working in the forge. Above, a small slitted window lets in some fresh air, helping to take a bite out of the heat. A rickety table made from salt-stained planks lies in the center of the room, offering a simple snack. Nearby on the floor is an open barrel with a tin ladle chained to it. Several crates line the floor as well, acting as chairs.

node.name: Grimbly's Forge, Grinding Room
node.description: This is a small grinding room set apart from the others. Conveniently located by the break room, it also tends to be the most used. Young Gor'Tog lads, looking to earn a spare coin for their families, work to sweep up shavings and oil the stones.

node.name: Grimbly's Forge, Grinding Room
node.description: A large grated window set high on the east side of this room provides a steady stream of air from the outside world. Set back from the rest of the forge, only the whining of grinding metals can be heard. A large grindstone is here, accompanied by a moderately clean bucket of cool water.

node.name: Grimbly's Forge, Grinding Room
node.description: The warm air is filled with the smell of heated metal. Far from the sound of the hammers, the grindstones have been placed to allow for freedom of movement as journeyman smiths work to perfect their prized blades. Curious apprentices hover about, hoping to learn a trick or two studying those that take a turn at the wheel.

node.name: Ratha, Ruined Neighborhood
node.description: The street lies desolate, ruined husks of buildings lining the street like giant skeletons. Wide claw marks have been gouged into the scattered remains, further shredding the weather-damaged wood. Massive wooden beams brace a wide barricade to the south.

node.name: Ratha, Ruined Neighborhood
node.description: The road ambles north and south, but a small alley leads west between two crumbling houses. Broken glass and chunks of worked stone litter the street, surrounding an upturned granite bench in the middle of the road. A wide smear of dried blood leads from the bench, into the alley, and out of sight.

node.name: Ratha, Ruined Neighborhood
node.description: A large house has collapsed into the street, blocking most of the intersection. A large skeleton, its huge skull bleached white against the darker wood, lies crushed under one particularly large beam. The rough ground around the skeleton is scarred deeply, as if scraped by large claws.

node.name: Ratha, Ruined Neighborhood
node.description: Broken cobbles make up the road that surrounds a wide stone fountain. Rubble lines the bottom edge of the dried-up reservoir, fallen from the exposed lip. A large plaza, seemingly untouched by the weather, spreads out to the west, and collapsed in one of its corners is the wooden skeleton of a merchant's cart.

node.name: Ratha, Ruined Neighborhood
node.description: To the east of the street, a small house lies in abject decay. The face of the structure seems mostly secure and its door and small window still seem functional despite apparent abuse. Near the roof, the southern wall has been destroyed, revealing another possible entrance to the house's loft. A dried stone fountain rests in the plaza to the northwest, while the road continues north and west around it.

node.name: Ratha, Ruined Neighborhood
node.description: A rusted iron fence lines the northern perimeter of the street, which continues south and west. Weeds and briars have taken over what could have once been a viewing garden just through the fence. A dried and aging fountain dominates the plaza, a cobbled pathway leading southwest through its center.

node.name: Ratha, Ruined Neighborhood
node.description: The remains of tall ruined houses line the western side of the street, unable to withstand the constant ravages of the tropical weather. Wind-worn beams lie crisscrossed amidst the wreckage, nearly obscuring a small hole underneath. To the east, a dried-up fountain stands as a scarred memory of the former residents.

node.name: Ratha, Ruined Neighborhood
node.description: Two overgrown strips of grass line a small gravel path leading up to a stone statue resembling a muscular Human grasping a shark. Countless bone fragments contrast sharply against the lush grass and weeds, and a scattering of humanoid skulls serve as a grim suggestion of what may have happened here. The street continues away from the statue to the northeast and southeast.

node.name: Ratha, Ruined Neighborhood
node.description: An oppressive heaviness weighs on the air here. The crumbling remains of a white gazebo lean against the rusted iron fence lining the northern side of the street. Several pieces of the lumber have been dragged about the area, some sporting unsightly crimson blotches or smears. One particularly long post still bears a skeletal hand loosely wrapped around its base.

node.name: Ratha, Decaying Home
node.description: A row of four rusted beds lines the back of the room, each covered in a dark red crust. Two skeletons, sprawled across the pitted frames, are covered in stained crimson sheets. The east wall bears a faded painting of a proud knight and a small window with a broken pane peers west onto the abandoned street outside. A shoddy ladder leads to a loft, the entrance obscured by tattered grey curtains.

node.name: Ratha, Decaying Home
node.description: A thick oaken table dominates the center of this room and the skeleton of a small dog rests curled up on the middle of it. Ash and partially burned logs lie scattered about the room but seem more concentrated in front of the open wood-burning stove sitting in a corner. All of the cabinets have fallen off the walls, leaving shattered dishes and flatware strewn about the floor as well. A large window looks north onto a garden overgrown with weeds.

node.name: Decaying Home, Loft
node.description: The smell of refuse and molding linen clings to the still air in this loft. Scattered piles of composting cloth are nested about the room, giving the impression that the space was once inhabitable. Tattered grey curtains dangle from the west side of the ceiling, ending just above a shoddy ladder leading to the living quarters down below.
