node.description: Dark crimson curtains frame the long opening that looks out into the performance hall. Oak plank flooring has been polished to a mirror like finish, reflecting the bright candlelight from a row of copper lanterns edging the semi-circular stage.

node.name: Hotagi'rath Theater, Catwalk
node.description: Hung high above the stage this catwalk consists of intersecting metal girders, allowing set designers, production crews and theater staff behind the scenes access to several props and lighting setups. Not for the faint of heart, a flimsy ladder leads down to the wings so as not to disturb any rehearsals or performances that may be going on. Due to the number of accidents that have occurred in the past, signs have been hung to remind the over confident of the dangers involved in working at this height.

node.name: Hotagi'rath Theater, Golden Lyre Club
node.description: Welcoming citizens as they enter the club is a mahogany bar, stocked with a variety of complimentary libations to encourage a social mood. Thick, crimson carpets and heavy draperies help silence noise from the bustling city outside, their colors enhanced by the dim lighting emanating from a black iron chandelier hung from the paneled ceiling. Grouped around low, circular tables to invite conversation, overstuffed leather armchairs are placed to take advantage of the warmth a limestone fireplace provides.

node.name: Golden Lyre Club, Balcony Dining
node.description: The balcony's scalloped rim juts out over the performance hall, giving diners a bird's-eye view of the stage. Positioned so that no view is hampered, a row of curved booths is generously padded in an attempt to add comfort during the lengthiest of concerts. Vents, cleverly hidden by decorative sago palms, allow a cool, refreshing breeze to circulate through the spacious room, carrying the aroma of the dishes laid out for the enjoyment of citizens down to the first floor.

node.name: Lileyew's Workshop, Main Room
node.description: The thick scent of sawdust and varnish permeates every corner of the workshop. Long wooden shelves, illuminated by copper wall lamps, line each wall and organize carefully stacked piles of broken and neglected instruments. A child's music box, its gears and cogs exposed by whatever accident befell it, sits waiting forlornly on a small table in the center of the room.

node.name: Lileyew's Workshop, Office
node.description: A broom, its bristles frayed with use, leans crookedly against the corner of a battered pine desk. A handful of oil paintings vie for wall space with a curious array of antique instruments and an oddly-shaped carved wooden mask.

node.name: Lileyew's Workshop, Parlor
node.description: Decorated for comfort rather than style, this appears to be the owner's place to entertain guests. Goosedown pillows and thick rugs scattered around the gleaming floor create plenty of lounging space, and a copper kettle hoots and hisses over a charcoal brazier. Framed parchments covered by musical notations are hung around the walls and, on a small table, a metronome gently ticks away time.

node.name: Ratha, Theater Roof
node.description: The view from here is breathtaking. Both the city below and the lifts that lead above can be seen. Ships of all sorts fill the harbor, their masts pointing at the sky like a giant finger. The streets look almost alive with the flickering of lights and the movement of Ratha's citizens.

node.name: Ratha, Small House
node.description: An aging female S'Kra rests in a nest of pillows beside a small fire. In her scaled hand, she holds a copy of Moliko the Balance's treatise on justice. Above the fire, a small portrait of the woman as a young girl gleams in the light.

node.name: Office of the Malk'smo
node.description: An expansive walnut desk neatly divides the constable's workspace from the rest of the room. Visitors walk across a polished granite floor, but the Malk'smo's chair rests on the plush carpet behind the desk. A gold plated door leads to the holding cell where the Malk'smo entertain their more serious visitors.

A gaethzen stand-lamp hovers over the large walnut desk which divides the constable's area from the rest of the room. A rich carpet covers the polished granite floor, but only behind the desk. A gold plated door leads to the holding cell where the Malk'smo entertain their more serious visitors.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Promenade East
node.description: The constant drone of giant pulleys is almost lost amidst the pleasant breeze that blows atop the terrace. Carts and carriages exchange places on the lift either returning to the terrace with supplies or headed for the great gates of Ratha and distant points beyond.

The occasional drone of giant pulleys is heard over the howl of the evening breeze. Even in the wee hours of the morning, carts and wagons wearily enter or depart the lift heading toward the ports or the city gates to the north.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Promenade East
node.description: Large pots of flowers dot the perfect promenade. Along the elegant balustrades, passersby stop to enjoy the view of the ocean far beyond and the bustling palace district below.

Large pots of flowers that are vibrant by day, cast long elegant shadows on the perfect brickwork of the walkway by night. Beyond the marble balustrades, the lights of the palace and gardens present a luminous spectacle beyond measure.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Promenade East
node.description: Elegant willows drape comforting arms over the pristine walkway. Lending a hand to stir a cooling breeze or protect from the biting sun, the ancient trees enhance the loveliness of the promenade.
Elegant willows drape comforting arms over the pristine walkway. Lending a hand to stir a cooling breeze or filter the sparkling moonlight, the ancient trees enhance the loveliness of the promenade.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Promenade East
node.description: Beautiful topiaries adorn the expansive walkway, in striking contrast to the simple beauty of the sparkling sea. Large wagons laden with provisions traverse the cobbled avenue, drivers anxious to make deliveries on time to any one of several large estates in the vicinity.
Beautiful topiaries by day take on strange, almost monstrous shapes by night. Far beyond the elaborate balustrades and the sheer cliffs, the velvet sea shimmers with tiny points of reflected light.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Promenade East
node.description: The rows of windswept willows and stately ironwood shade the walkways along the promenade. Tantalizing smells wend their way toward appreciative bystanders and fade into the salt-sea air and the city beyond.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Promenade East
node.description: Several lovely homes are set back from the road, framed in a backdrop of rolling green acres and towering trees. The views from this vantage point are breathtaking, whether it be the lovely terrace itself or the sparkling ocean beyond.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Promenade East
node.description: An expansive drive veers off toward the west and the lovely surroundings of a towering mansion. The elaborate gate is manned by a uniformed servant who allows only those people with business on the property to gain entrance.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Por'oson Drive
node.description: Swirls of smoke drift upwards from the stone chimney atop an odd open air building. Several people gather around a blazing cook fire tending two large spits. Turning slowly over the coals the glorious contents sizzle and roast sending splendid aromas airborne.

Swirls of smoke drift upwards from the stone chimney of an odd open air building. As the cook fires are banked for the night, the site often attracts weary travelers who stop to warm themselves by the fire and partake of a steaming mug of coffee.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Por'oson Drive
node.description: A low ivy covered wall brings the expansive greenery of the terrace into view as the drive skirts the northeast border of the lovely Deversham park. Toward the southwest the beauty of the ocean catches the eye of all who traverse this section of town.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Por'oson Drive
node.description: Bleached timbers and stone form the retaining wall that channels a constant flow of travelers to and from the great city gates.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Por'oson Drive
node.description: The pace of traffic is chaotic at times as the drive approaches the Por'oson Gate. Travelers mill about asking directions to their destinations or seeking transportation to the distant locales beyond the city limits.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Por'oson Gate
node.description: The great wall culminates here with the large and stately Por'oson Gate. Day and night, streams of travelers find paths through the gate to the agricultural lands and great forests to the northeast, or find access to the ports of the city below. A pair of wary guards watches the comings and goings here, constantly alert to potential trouble.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Gateway Drive
node.description: Workers laden with baskets and carts head toward the Por'oson gate and the agricultural fields beyond. Children mingle among the throng of travelers and it is a wonder that more are not lost in the shuffle.

The drive is quiet this time of night, an occasional traveller wearily plodding down the drive toward the lower reaches of the city and the comforts of home. Soft lamplight radiates from the polished lanterns burning along the great wall.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Gateway Drive
node.description: Chaos and confusion is typical at this intersection between the main gates to the city. A large sign directs the traveler to one of two possible exits. Nadamian Avenue to the south is the main thoroughfare leading to the lifts and the city below.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Gateway Drive
node.description: A handsome stone and timber kiosk stands back from the road, the crossed swords identifying it as the guard station. Wagonloads of goods arrive in a steady stream heading toward the Sur'oson gate and the distant towns beyond.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Sur'oson Gate
node.description: Tall timbers and rough-hewn stone form a giant gate in the great wall. Standing open for the streams of wagon and foot traffic to pass through, the entrance to Ratha is carefully guarded by observant sentinels who watch every passerby with trained eyes.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Sur'oson Drive
node.description: Traffic is kept to a minimum along the drive as guards siphon the majority of travelers through to Nadamian Road. The large wall opens up to the east allowing an expansive view of the lush greenery of the terrace.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Sur'oson Drive
node.description: The low half wall is replaced by a high, stone and timber wall which serves as a barrier to the great wilderness beyond the city limits. To the east, views of regal drives and sumptuous acres greet the visitor or passerby.

The low half wall is replaced by a high, stone and timber wall which serves as a barrier to the great wilderness beyond the city limits. To the east, the regal drives are darkened, and soft lights dot the expansive acreage as the community slumbers.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Sur'oson Drive
node.description: Shining tiled roofs, lush topiary gardens and manicured grounds present the onlooker with a beautiful view. As gorgeous as the surrounding neighborhoods are, they all pale in comparison to the timeless beauty of the ocean to the west.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Sur'oson Drive
node.description: A stiff breeze blows here constantly, on the windward side of the terrace. A gentle slope rises from the road toward the east covered with softly waving grasses and wild flowers. An old stone bench allows travelers a chance to sit and enjoy the view.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Promenade West
node.description: Fine marble arches of the promenade loom to the south, their polished surfaces glinting with reflected light. Families often stroll here, taking in the crisp air and the remarkable sights. Several exquisite homes are nestled back from the road amid lush, manicured lawns.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Promenade West
node.description: A tree lined drive winds up the manicured hillside toward a magnificent estate. A quaint carriage house sits just back from the road, enclosed by elegant iron fencing.

A pair of stone nagas rise to either side of the great lifts that lead to the upper tiers. The constant drone of the lift is only intermittent now during the quiet hours of night, and guards in nearby posts doze sporadically. Sailors and merchants frequent the bazaar at this time of night, seeking trinkets for the lovely ladies that catch their fancy.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Promenade West
node.description: Swirling winds howl through the marble arches as the walkway turns toward the northeast. Shielded from much of the wind, families stroll comfortably along the walk enjoying the dramatic views.
Large marble arches shelter the walkway from the brisk evening breezes. Crystal highlights glance off the ocean to the west lending an almost dreamlike quality to this section of the promenade.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Promenade West
node.description: The expansive facade of a large columnar building overshadows the elegance of the walkway. Commanding a sweeping view of the eastern ocean and the bustling palace below, the building is set back from the roadway atop a small knoll. Ornate fencing surrounds the property and a large gate, emblazoned with a royal coat of arms, marks the entrance to graceful driveway.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Promenade West
node.description: The marble of the balustrade is used to create a series of arches that offer a bit of protection from the constant breeze. Elegant rose vines climb their marbled surfaces and paint a pretty picture against the azure of the sea beyond.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Promenade West
node.description: Perfectly polished walkways and matching marble balustrades reflect just a portion of the incredible finery found on this tier. Liveried carriages roll past conveying their occupants toward the sumptuous estates on the eastern side of the terrace.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Promenade West
node.description: The tinkle of music and chimes intermingle with a pleasant breeze upon which floats the smell of something incredibly delicious. Exclusive shops and artisans offer services to the privileged residents of the Shh'o'kumu Terrace.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Nadamian Avenue
node.description: The wondrous smells of a nearby kitchen mingle with a refreshing light breeze, tantalizing all who pass by. Roving musicians are often seen along the avenue lending a festive environment to the otherwise busy thoroughfare.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Nadamian Avenue
node.description: The walkways here become expansive plazas lined with potted trees and assorted floral finery. Exclusive merchants are often seen setting up impromptu shops on this spot, offering strolling residents and servants a chance to partake of their delightful offerings.
The walkways here become expansive plazas lined with potted trees and assorted floral finery. All is quiet now, an occasional sweep sauntering by intent on ridding the area of unsightly refuse.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Nadamian Avenue
node.description: Perfectly patterned brickwork adorns this wide avenue that pierces the heart of the terrace. Tall, gold trimmed lamp posts display large, colorful hanging baskets filled with sumptuous flowers and variegated ivy.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Nadamian Avenue
node.description: The neatly trimmed hedges and arboreal canopy frame the wide avenue that channels the majority of traffic north and south. This is a favorite spot of neighborhood ruffians who enjoy sneaking away from their rigorous studies and nosy nannies to throw rocks at passing wagons.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Nadamian Avenue
node.description: Ivy draped walls rise to contain the clamorous traffic along the avenue, protecting nearby property from the sights and sounds of one of Ratha's busiest thoroughfares.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Nadamian Avenue
node.description: Brisk wagon traffic and streams of people move north and south along this wide avenue. Bordered with tall silverwillow trees and low sculpted hedges, the avenue is pleasing to the eye, yet extremely functional.
The bustle and chaos of the day is now only a distant memory. Traffic continues along this stretch of avenue all through the night, but the pace is more relaxed.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Deversham Place
node.description: The lane takes a turn downward to give clearance to the main roadway above. This spot is a busy byway for local nannies who take their charges to the lovely Deversham park to the east.
Lovely brass lanterns light this portion of the lane, near the beloved park that is now a likely subject of many a child's dream.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Zsikiel Lane
node.description: The lane dips here slightly to pass under the main arterial above. Thick boxwood, ironwood, and ivy completely hide the wagon and foot traffic from view, helping to preserve the quiet, peaceful atmosphere of the area.
The lane dips here to pass under the main arterial above. Brass lanterns cast a warming glow that completely illuminates the lane, casting long shadows on cascades of draping foliage.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Zsikiel Lane
node.description: A jewel encrusted escutcheon adorns a large gate leading into the Zsikiel estate. Jade and lapis have been crushed and inlaid into the stone walkway, forming a colorful sea-green mosaic. The Zsikiel family plays host to hundreds of visitors a year, the elegant walks and grand entrance a showcase for Ratha's sterling upper class.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Zsikiel Lane
node.description: Delicious smells of roasting meats, spices and freshly baked bread waft past on a luscious breeze. Somewhere closeby, the kitchen staff of a nearby estate prepares a sumptuous meal for the family and their guests.

Lingering smells of the evenings repast waft through the air, the scent of cinnamon and coffee still strong. Somewhere closeby, warming fires and relaxed conversation enfold the hard-working staff of any of the nearby estates, as they relax a bit and focus on their own families.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Zsikiel Lane
node.description: The soft tinkle of chimes and the scent of roses mingles on a breeze. Alongside the lane, a low white fence marks the sumptuous boundary of a formal garden. A series of elaborate fountains punctuates the sculpted greenery as it spans east toward some incredibly beautiful homes.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Zsikiel Lane
node.description: Stone steps lead up a neatly trimmed hillock toward a stone manse. Ancient bentwood pines flank the walkway with polished brass lanterns prepared to light the way in the dark of night.
Stone steps lead up a neatly trimmed hillock toward a stone manse. Ancient bentwood pines flank the walkway with polished brass lanterns lighting the way.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Zsikiel Lane
node.description: A delightful lane is paved in perfectly matched cobbles, and bordered by low whitewashed fencing and sculpted hedges. Draping willows form an arch over the roadway.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Deversham Place
node.description: Brightly colored pennants on polished brass poles herald the entrance to the much loved Deversham Park. During the day, the park is filled with delighted children and their guardians who enjoy the festive accoutrements, and roving artisans. In the evening hours it is a popular spot for romantic picnics by the pond.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Deversham Place
node.description: A broad plaza, framed by manicured lawns forms the central portion of the park. Three brightly festooned gazebos serve as showplaces for a variety of wandering artists and performers who come here regularly to entertain the privileged children of the terrace.

A broad plaza, framed by manicured lawns forms the central portion of the park. Three brightly lit gazebos serve as showplaces for a variety of wandering artists and performers who come here nightly to entertain the privileged children of the terrace.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Pantel Estate
node.description: The neatly trimmed lawns of Deversham park blend seamlessly with the sprawling grounds of a large estate. A long drive, bordered by sprawling diamondwood trees, leads to a house of magnificent proportions. The Pantel family is familiar with sprawling real estate, owning nearly all the agricultural land outside the city gates to the north.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Cherrywood Lane
node.description: Several lovely homes are set back from the lane. Large cherrywood trees span the lane creating a cathedral-like effect, hence the lane's name. The driveways, landscaping and finishing touches of every home in the area speak of the tremendous wealth found in this privileged community.

node.name: Shh'o'kumu Terrace, Cherrywood Lane
node.description: A simple fountain commands the center of the lane emitting an intermittent geyser of sparkling water that spills cheerfully into a pool below. Smooth cobbles lend a feeling of quaint simplicity to an otherwise elegant neighborhood. Stone benches have been placed around the fountain on each side of the lane offering the passerby a chance to sit and enjoy.

A simple fountain commands the center of the lane emitting an intermittent geyser of sparkling water that catches and reflects the moonlight. Stone benches placed around the fountain are often occupied by happy couples out for a romantic stroll.

node.name: Eluned's Temple, Pool
node.description: A rock protrudes, but it does not appear to be the bottom of the pool. The cold water swirls in a strong current here.

node.name: Crescent Cove, Shrine to Phelim
node.description: Open to the sky above, this quiet enclosure is dedicated to Phelim, Lord of Dreams. Odd sigils adorn the arches forming the shrine and a raised pedestal at the center of the shrine supports a Halfling-high statue of the deity. Though no censers are apparent, the scent of sandalwood permeates the air.

Open to the sky above, this quiet enclosure is dedicated to Phelim, Lord of Dreams. Odd sigils adorn the arches forming the shrine and a raised pedestal at the center of the shrine supports a Halfling-high statue of the deity. Though no censers are apparent, the scent of sandalwood permeates the air.

node.name: Ratha, Lift
node.description: The polished oak floor is marred by the travel of wheeled carts and inconsiderate animal owners. Despite the poor behavior of some travelers the lift is well-maintained and operates nearly flawlessly.

node.name: Ratha, Lift
node.description: The fine polished oak floor is scarred by the travel of cloven hooves and careless weaponmasters. Despite the brutishness of some travelers the lift is well-maintained and operates near flawlessly.

node.name: Malk'smo Holding Cell
node.description: The polished dark granite floor yields seamlessly to slick granite walls leaving not the slightest crevice to begin scratching an escape. Polished steel bars cover a small vent high on one wall. Dark rich grain in the highly polished granite serves only to emphasize the depth and quality of the stone. There is no escape from this cell, only release.

node.name: Ratha, Lift
node.description: The gold-plated wooden planks of this lift make the floor difficult to walk on but very tempting to pry up. Such a display of style over substance reminds travelers that they are close to the wealthiest citizens in all of Qi.

node.name: Ratha, Lift
node.description: The silver-plated wooden planks of this lift make the floor difficult to walk on and even harder to look at during sunshine filled days. Such a display of style over substance reminds travelers that they are close to the wealthiest citizens in all of Qi.

node.name: Imperial Palm Inn, Carriage Walk
node.description: Brightly illuminated lanterns hang from tall iron poles forming pools of warm amber light along the sandstone path. The crystal dome of the inn glows against the black velvet night sky.

Pale grey sandstone bricks create a smooth passage toward an elegant inn to the northeast. Travelers casually rest upon cool white marble benches beneath the towering palm trees throughout the lush terraced gardens. Shell-pink granite walls rise above the trees to the red clay tiled roof of the building.

node.name: Imperial Palm Inn, Emerald Gardens
node.description: Moths flitter at globe-like lanterns that sit nestled along the gravel paths creating small pools of flickering light. The sweet scent of wisteria wafts through the night air on the slightest breeze. Among the dim shadows, the outline of a small structure appears to sit in the center of a mirror image of the starry velvet sky.

A walk through this shady garden can be a rewarding side trip. Stately trees form green walls along winding gravel paths that bisect the gardens from large expanses of manicured green lawns. At the crossroads is a white gazebo surrounded by three symmetrical reflecting pools. Standing on a small moss covered mound, the little structure seems to blush in the sunlight. Stepping stones create a path through the clear pools to the small marble structure.

node.name: Imperial Palm Inn, Carriage Passage
node.description: Infinitesimal crystal grains in the stonework sparkle beneath the moonlit night. Standing lanterns along the drive light the underside of the tall palm's graceful fonds giving them the appearance of glowing umbrellas as they shelter the pathway.

Majestic palms line this sandstone drive. A large crystal dome sparkles with the colors of a rainbow as it rises serenely amidst the red barrel tile roof of the inn. Tall open archways of the building's facade can partially be seen through lush gardens that cover the face of the inn.

node.name: Imperial Palm Inn, Carriage Portico
node.description: Rough-hewned granite walls that form two-story arches create a sheltered walkway for this grand inn. The ornately carved mahogany double doors hang heavily from highly polished brass hinges and bear the inn's crest. Tall potted ferns line the walkway beneath the towering arches.

node.name: Imperial Palm Inn, Kitchen
node.description: The aroma of roasting meats and simmering soups wafts through the tiled area. The sound of whistling tea kettles from atop an iron stove mingles with the barking orders of a chef to a line of lads as they chop vegetables upon scarred wooden tables. Frazzled looking waiters scurry through the room carrying large platters full of filled plates to waiting guests.

node.name: Kitchen, Service Pantry
node.description: The oak floor has become worn down the center of the pantry to a dull luster from the constant traffic of waiters running through. Tiled pantry shelves line one wall, filled with the inn's custom china and various baked goods. On the opposing wall, a wine rack holds myriad beverages.

node.name: Imperial Palm Inn, Dining Room
node.description: The lime-washed carved oak walls and an intricately inlaid oak parquet floor create an inviting atmosphere. An oak footbridge beneath the wide arches to the east and glassed doors to the west create an outdoor feel within these walls. Composed waiters dressed in deep blue velvet livery move silently around a blue silk tapestry screen that stands near a dark oak sideboard. Ferns separate the area to provide quiet corners and secluded tables for those private dining moments.

node.name: Imperial Palm Inn, Grand Ballroom
node.description: This room is aglow with candlelight from the gold chandeliers that hang at measured intervals from the beamed ceiling. Silk brocade drapes cascade gracefully down the back wall to pool upon the gold-veined white marble tiles of the floor. Soft music seems to float all around the room from a small lattice window. A low marble footbridge crosses a tiled streambed into the atrium to the south.

node.name: Imperial Palm Inn, Lobby
node.description: Tall palms in ornate brass pots stand before two-story arched windows that illuminate this grand lobby. Rich burgundy tapestries hang from pale beige painted walls that have been polished to a porcelain lustre. This immense room is dominated by a bronze sculpture in the center. Muffled voices can be heard from a dark arch to the west. A small teak footbridge crosses a narrow stream that surrounds an atrium at the center of the inn.

node.name: Wayfarer's Tankard, Tap Room
node.description: Thick redwood beams frame the rough white plastered walls of the pub. Heads of various creatures and weapons are mounted on the walls for display. Near the door a gleaming suit of armor stands with blazing shield in one hand, a greatsword in the other. Booths line the interior walls while redwood trestle tables surrounded by padded leather barrel chairs are scattered throughout the tavern. The heady scent of ale mingles with the musty smell of oak burning in the stone fireplace.

node.name: Imperial Palm Inn, Lobby
node.description: A thick burgundy carpeted runner climbs the beige marble steps of a grand divided staircase. Magnificient crystal candelabras on brass stands line the staircase rendering bright illumination on every step. Large bouquets of vibrant pink lilies stand as sentinels at the base of the stairs in white halfling-size porcelain vases. A small teak footbridge crosses into the domed atrium.

node.name: Tap Room, Dark Booth
node.description: A single bronze sconce is mounted on the wall rendering a warm glow upon the redwood burl table. A stuffed grendel is mounted on the wall high above the table and bench. Hushed voices can be heard from nearby tables and booths.

node.name: Tap Room, Fireside Table
node.description: The heat radiating from the stone fireplace warms this section of the tap room nicely. The light from the brass lantern on this rough-hewn redwood trestle table competes with the amber glow from the fire. Barrels chairs line either side of the table to provide seating for many friends.

node.name: Courtyard, Topaz Gardens
node.description: The soft sounds of clinking crystal glasses and muted voices can be heard from the dining room that lies across a footbridge to the west. Soft light from the dining room strays into the garden lighting the nearest foliage before fading into the shadows.

Surrounded by lush ferns and tall palms from the nearby gardens, this western portion is alive with the colors of a sunset. Raised stone flowerbeds of bright marigolds, daffodils, tulips, and anemone cozy up behind stone benches. The scent of the blooms blends harmoniously with the aromas from the dining room that lies across a footbridge to the west. A gem-colored tiled fountain can be clearly seen over low shrubs and flowers at the end of a sandy path.

node.name: Courtyard, Jade Gardens
node.description: The sweet scent of alyssum wafts gently through the room. A single lantern sits near a stone bench rendering a softly illuminated resting spot amidst the lush tropical atrium. Soft music and gay voices can be heard from the ballroom across a low white marble footbridge.

node.name: Courtyard, Garnet Gardens
node.description: Tall torches planted among the foliage create a blazing glow around this section of the garden. Shadows cast from the light upon the plants waltz slowly across the leaves and paths as if to music only they can hear.

node.name: Courtyard, Sapphire Gardens
node.description: Sleepy flowers nod lazily among the shrubbery. Light from the lobby's chandeliers silently inch into the garden creating flickering shadows along the path. A blue mirror ball seems to glow from the lanterned light as it reflects its surroundings, nestled within the flowers and shrubs.

node.name: Courtyard, Fountain
node.description: Within a sea of lush plants and sandy path reefs is an oasis of cool inviting water that bubbles musically from a stone fountain. Large delicate pink water lily blossoms rise above platter-shaped leaves and float undisturbed upon the crystal clear water of the sparkling tiled basin at the fountain's base. A stone statue rises from the center of the basin beneath a misty spray.

node.name: Imperial Palm Inn, Grand Suites Gallery
node.description: Tall palms rise to tickle the base of this balustraded balcony that encircles the inn's lush center courtyard. Crystal and brass chandeliers enhance the lighting from the stained-glass dome above. Highly polished carved doors line the gallery, each inlaid with a gold design. The grand divided staircase continues its climb toward the towers.

node.name: Imperial Palm Inn, Grand Suites Gallery
node.description: Tall palms rise to tickle the base of this balustraded balcony that encircles the inn's lush center courtyard. Crystal and brass chandeliers enhance the lighting from the stained-glass dome above. Highly polished carved doors line the gallery, each inlaid with a gold design.

node.name: Imperial Palm Inn, Grand Suites Gallery
node.description: Tall palms rise to tickle the base of this balustraded balcony that encircles the inn's lush center courtyard. Crystal and brass chandeliers enhance the lighting from the stained-glass dome above. Highly polished carved doors line the gallery, each inlaid with a gold design.

node.name: Imperial Palm Inn, Grand Suites Gallery
node.description: Tall palms rise to tickle the base of this balustraded balcony that encircles the inn's lush center courtyard. Crystal and brass chandeliers enhance the lighting from the stained-glass dome above. Highly polished carved doors line the gallery, each inlaid with a gold design.

node.name: Imperial Palm Inn, Peony Suite
node.description: An oval-framed painting hangs upon the butternut colored walls above the simple oak mantled fireplace. Smoothly sanded unfinished oak floors are covered with a scattering of soft pastel rugs. Large splashes of bright pink peonies are embroidered across a cream colored coverlet upon an oak sleigh bed. A crochet throw drapes casually across one of the small over-stuffed chairs that snuggle close to the fireplace.

node.name: Imperial Palm Inn, Wisteria Suite
node.description: A plush deep forest green rug embroidered with wisteria blossom covers the mahogany parquet floor. An ivory satin comforter lays beneath matching pillows stitched with a fern design which, in turn, lean elegantly upon the elaborately carved headboard of a large feather bed. A royal purple velvet divan sits at the foot of the bed.

node.name: Imperial Palm Inn, Gardenia Suite
node.description: This room with its polished walnut wood floors, ivory walls and wide window creates light and open spaces throughout. Crystal and brass sconces hang upon the wall above the intricately carved walnut mantle surrounding a warm white marble fireplace. A walnut canopy bed is draped with white velvet curtains that are tied back to each post with a gold tasseled rope. Plush white velvet chairs with matching footstools are trimmed with gold velvet trim at the seams.

node.name: Imperial Palm Inn, Willow Suite
node.description: Pale mint-green walls greet a cream-colored ceiling with a molding of carved willow. The bent willow furniture throughout the room is accented with celadon green and grey cotton cushions. An unfinished willow canopy bed is draped with cream gauze across the top of the frame then secured at each post with a raffia tie.

node.name: Imperial Palm Inn, Rose Suite
node.description: Soft apple green painted walls provide a fresh bright background for a mix of rose reds, strawberry pinks and milky whites. The red and white floral print drapes match the panels and duvet on the simple pine canopy bed. White wicker chairs with their pink rose patterned chintz cushions create a cozy nook for conversations.

node.name: Imperial Palm Inn, Iris Suite
node.description: White beaded board walls and floors are accented in pale blues and lavenders with just a whisper of grey. Two short stout columns, parallel the floor-to-ceiling window, hold securely in their grasp a pale blue canvas hammock. Two deck chairs made of driftwood sit to one side of the room.

node.name: Reshalia, Coastal Road
node.description: The heavy wooden Por'oson Gate stands open even at night, but the guards keep a close eye on anyone passing through, occasionally stopping a suspicious-looking traveler to ask his business. Torches flaring in heavy iron sconces provide bright illumination, although the shadows that remain seem even blacker by contrast.

The heavy wooden Por'oson Gate stands open day and night, and the guards keep an eye on everyone passing through, occasionally stopping a suspicious-looking traveler to ask his business. Most of those going in and out are local farmers bringing in loads of grain or other crops in huge, heaped wooden farm wagons, and the guards' most careful scrutiny is reserved for the few strangers who pass by.

node.name: Ratha, Outside Sur'oson Gate
node.description: Cloaked travelers slip in and out of the gate, wrapped up against the chill of the night and carrying torches and lanterns to light their way. Although there are relatively few folk passing through at this hour, the gate guards seem particularly alert as they assess each person, keeping one eye on the shadows.

All manner of travelers mill about the gate, either waiting their turn to enter or pushing through the crowds in the opposite direction if they're leaving. Farmers pass through with wagonloads of produce and grain, fishermen with their catches, and rangers with bundles of hides. The gate guards look on, watching everyone.

node.name: Urrem'tier's Temple, Interior
node.description: One single candle lights the way in the interior room of the temple. The light flickers as an unnerving cool breeze that seems to come from nowhere chills the air. Reflections can be seen on the walls made of black glasslike material that is polished to a high shine. Unfamiliar scraping and hissing noises leave the hair at the nape of the neck standing on end.

node.name: Urrem'tier's Temple, Room of Death
node.description: Two acolytes stand guard over a cold black marble altar, while others drag the deceased and pull them on top in offering to Urrem'tier. The darkness is broken by the lone torch that stands next to the altar, casting a glow on the black glass walls.

node.name: Urrem'tier's Temple, Dark Alcove
node.description: Snickering noises echo in the alcove, or maybe it is the unknown breeze that chills the air even colder here than in the outer room. Shadows dance on the walls yet there is no light source visible to cause them. A larger than life onyx scorpion statue stands menacingly in the middle of the room.

node.name: Urrem'tier's Temple, Under the Interior
node.description: The scraping noises are louder now and seem to come from all around. An arched doorway is cut into the black rock that leads off into an endless tunnel. Torches are placed over the doorway to help light the way through the darkness.

node.name: Under the Temple, Urrem'tier's Tunnel
node.description: Darkness permeates the cave with the only light coming from some source to the north of the tunnel. Trickling noises seem to come from behind the walls as well as an unfamiliar hissing sound coming from somewhere within.

node.name: Aldauth's Lair, Cavern of Glass
node.description: Shadows flicker on every wall possibly coming from the torches reflecting off of the black crystal walls. Tunnels branch off in many directions and show no signs of ending. An unfamiliar sound, possibly hissing, is enough to make hair stand on end.

node.name: Aldauth's Lair, Cavern of Glass
node.description: Shadows flicker on every wall possibly coming from the torches reflecting off of the black crystal walls. Tunnels branch off in many directions and show no signs of ending. An unfamiliar sound, possibly hissing, is enough to make hair stand on end.

node.description: Shadows flicker on every wall possibly coming from the torches reflecting off of the black crystal walls. Tunnels branch off in many directions and show no signs of ending. An unfamiliar sound, possibly hissing, is enough to make hair stand on end.

node.description: Shadows flicker on every wall possibly coming from the torches reflecting off of the black crystal walls. Tunnels branch off in many directions and show no signs of ending. An unfamiliar sound, possibly hissing, is enough to make hair stand on end.

node.name: Aldauth's Lair, Cavern of Glass
node.description: Shadows flicker on every wall possibly coming from the torches reflecting off of the black crystal walls. Tunnels branch off in many directions and show no signs of ending. An unfamiliar sound, possibly hissing, is enough to make hair stand on end.

node.name: Cavern of Glass, Eylhaar's Grotto
node.description: Formations of marbled white and black glass make up the interior of the grotto. Less eerie here, light seems to filter in from cracks in the ceiling, giving an indication the exit is near. The tunnel narrows down to an entrance leading north back towards safety.

node.name: Cavern of Glass, Eylhaar's Grotto
node.description: An almost eerie quiet fills this part of the cavern. No sounds seem to filter through except for the occasional echo of a footstep nearby. Carved images in the cavern walls depict scenes of death in a more natural state.

node.name: Cavern of Glass, Eylhaar's Grotto
node.description: An almost eerie quiet fills this part of the cavern. No sounds seem to filter through except for the occasional echo of a footstep nearby. Carved images in the cavern walls depict scenes of death in a more natural state.

node.name: Cavern of Glass, Eylhaar's Grotto
node.description: An almost eerie quiet fills this part of the cavern. No sounds seem to filter through except for the occasional echo of a footstep nearby. Carved images in the cavern walls depict scenes of death in a more natural state.

node.name: Cavern of Glass, Eylhaar's Grotto
node.description: An almost eerie quiet fills this part of the cavern. No sounds seem to filter through except for the occasional echo of a footstep nearby. Carved images in the cavern walls depict scenes of death in a more natural state.

node.name: Cavern of Glass, Eylhaar's Grotto
node.description: An almost eerie quiet fills this part of the cavern. No sounds seem to filter through except for the occasional echo of a footstep nearby. Carved images in the cavern walls depict scenes of death in a more natural state.

node.name: Cavern of Glass, Shrine to Eylhaar
node.description: The obvious end of the tunnel is a shrine to the goddess Eylhaar. A featureless statue, somewhat feminine in nature but with a hint of masculinity, stands next to a gnarled doorway. The feeling of death hangs in the air, but is one of a more peaceful, natural death. The walls themselves are etched with memorials of those who have died and may be buried here.

node.name: Aldauth's Lair, Cavern of Glass
node.description: Shadows flicker on every wall possibly coming from the torches reflecting off of the black crystal walls. Tunnels branch off in many directions and show no signs of ending. An unfamiliar sound, possibly hissing, is enough to make hair stand on end.

node.name: Aldauth's Lair, Cavern of Glass
node.description: Shadows flicker on every wall possibly coming from the torches reflecting off of the black crystal walls. Tunnels branch off in many directions and show no signs of ending. An unfamiliar sound, possibly hissing, is enough to make hair stand on end.

node.name: Aldauth's Lair, Cavern of Glass
node.description: Shadows flicker on every wall possibly coming from the torches reflecting off of the black crystal walls. Tunnels branch off in many directions and show no signs of ending. An unfamiliar sound, possibly hissing, is enough to make hair stand on end.

node.name: Aldauth's Lair, Cavern of Glass
node.description: Shadows flicker on every wall possibly coming from the torches reflecting off of the black crystal walls. Tunnels branch off in many directions and show no signs of ending. An unfamiliar sound, possibly hissing, is enough to make hair stand on end.

node.name: Aldauth's Lair, Cavern of Glass
node.description: Shadows flicker on every wall possibly coming from the torches reflecting off of the black crystal walls. Tunnels branch off in many directions and show no signs of ending. An unfamiliar sound, possibly hissing, is enough to make hair stand on end.

node.name: Aldauth's Lair, Cavern of Glass
node.description: Shadows flicker on every wall possibly coming from the torches reflecting off of the black crystal walls. Tunnels branch off in many directions and show no signs of ending. An unfamiliar sound, possibly hissing, is enough to make hair stand on end.

node.name: The Sewers, Narrow Pipe
node.description: Water flows in from the north, falling into a hole in the floor leading straight down. Iron rungs have been fastened to one wall of the dark pit, forming a slippery ladder. The constant moisture has ensured that the rungs are well-rusted, in some places pulling out from the wall.

node.name: The Sewers, Narrow Pipe
node.description: The walls are narrowly within a dagger stroke to either side, curving seamlessly into the ceiling and barely giving enough room to stand upright. Along the center of the floor a stream of dark water flows south.

node.name: The Sewers, Beneath the Grate
node.description: A fitful light filters through the bars of the grate overhead, and the air is unpleasant with odors probably best not identified. The walls and floor of the cramped space are built out of tightly fitted stone. A thin sheet of water flows southward down its center into a large pipe, just big enough to squeeze into.

node.name: The Sewers, Tunnels
node.description: A chill wind brushes by, blowing softly past from the black-throated tunnels stretching off in several directions. The rusted rungs of a ladder climb the north wall, disappearing into a narrow hole cut into the ceiling from which a constant stream of water falls to the floor. From a distance can be heard soft rustlings and movements, but from which direction, or whether from all directions at once, is impossible to tell.

node.name: The Sewers, Tunnels
node.description: Water falling from a line of pipes along the wall echoes unbearably loudly in the almost total darkness. The noise and lack of light make it difficult to either see or hear anything approaching until it is virtually next to you.

node.name: The Sewers, Tunnels
node.description: The atmosphere is icy cold, and tendrils of chill air seem to reach under clothing as if seeking warm flesh to feed upon. The light is very dim, and the walls of the tunnel are lost in shadowy darkness.

node.name: The Sewers, Tunnels
node.description: The tunnel walls have been built of a random mixture of brick and stone, as though the builders utilized whatever came to their hands at that moment. A small heap of bricks, stone, and dirt has fallen from the ceiling in one place, exposing raw dirt. The stability of the rest of the ceiling seems questionable.

node.name: The Sewers, The Snail Warren
node.description: A light flickers to the southwest, its beams reflecting off the damp stones of the passage. Compared to the black tunnels, no long night's dawn could be more welcome than this faint glimmer.

node.name: The Sewers, The Snailway
node.description: The tunnel broadens into a kind of anteroom where more care than usual has been taken to dress and smooth the walls and floor. The opening to the east is flanked by flaring torches in bronze holders shaped like lions' heads. It appears to pierce some kind of thick stone wall.

node.name: The Sewers, The Snail Warren
node.description: A red glow flickers in the distance to the northwest. Its light lends a sense of motion and distance, and dispels the oppressive feeling that the walls are closing in. The light, obviously from flames, wavers -- growing brighter one moment, dimmer the next.

node.name: The Sewers, The Snail Warren
node.description: In the darkness, senses other than sight press for attention: the slip of a loose brick underfoot or an odd whiff of incense becomes ominous when eyesight fails and only the click of claws on stone breaks the silence.

node.name: The Sewers, Snail Hollow
node.description: A few glowing wicks in wall niches cast dim light and dark shadows in a circular room lined with red tiles. From an opening in the ceiling big enough for a wagon, an occasional drop of water splashes to the floor. It trickles over to a matching hole in the floor and runs down the steeply sloping channel.

node.name: The Sewers, The Snail Warren
node.description: In the darkness, senses other than sight press for attention: the touch of a feathery, sticky strand or the reek of mold long in the making becomes ominous when eyesight fails and only what might be a footstep breaks the silence.

node.name: The Sewers, The Snail Warren
node.description: In the darkness, senses other than sight press for attention: the chill of a clammy breeze or a pungent, spicy aroma becomes ominous when eyesight fails and only a low-pitched rumble breaks the silence.

node.name: The Sewers, The Ferret Warren
node.description: A large circular opening -- curiously shaped like a big pipe -- dominates the ceiling of the room. From the southeast comes the light of flickering torches, contrasting sharply with the darkness to the northeast.

node.name: The Sewers, The Ferret Warren
node.description: In the darkness, senses other than sight press for attention: the touch of a drop of water -- surely it's water? -- or the tang of the salt sea becomes ominous when eyesight fails and only a sound like a sigh breaks the silence.

node.name: The Sewers, The Ferret Warren
node.description: The dim beams from the southwest, gleaming weakly on wet brick and rough walls, reveal three ominously dark entrances to the room. They stand like the gaping mouths of monsters into whose gullet one would not willingly travel.

node.name: The Sewers, The Ferretway
node.description: The tunnel broadens into a kind of anteroom where more care than usual has been taken to dress and smooth the walls and floor. The opening to the north is flanked by flaring torches in iron holders shaped like trolls' hands. It appears to pierce some kind of thick stone wall.

node.name: The Sewers, Ferret Hollow
node.description: A few glowing wicks in wall niches cast dim light and dark shadows in a circular room lined with green tiles. From an opening in the ceiling big enough for a wagon, an occasional drop of water splashes to the floor. It trickles over to a matching hole in the floor and runs down the steeply sloping channel.

node.name: The Sewers, Beetle Hollow
node.description: A few glowing wicks in wall niches cast dim light and dark shadows in a circular room lined with yellow tiles. From an opening in the ceiling big enough for a wagon, an occasional drop of water splashes to the floor. It trickles over to a matching hole in the floor and runs down the steeply sloping channel.

node.name: The Sewers, The Beetleway
node.description: The tunnel broadens into a kind of anteroom where more care than usual has been taken to dress and smooth the walls and floor. The opening to the east is flanked by flaring torches in brass holders shaped like trader logs. It appears to pierce some kind of thick stone wall.

node.name: The Sewers, The Beetle Warren
node.description: The tunnel turns at odd angles and disturbing slants, as if it were avoiding rooms rather than connecting them. A glimmer from the southwest promises clearer vision, but the shadows to the southeast might be nearer the reality of the Warren.

node.name: The Sewers, The Beetle Warren
node.description: In the darkness, senses other than sight press for attention: the chill of a clammy breeze or the smell of fish, fresh and otherwise, becomes ominous when eyesight fails and only a sound like a sigh breaks the silence.

node.name: The Sewers, The Beetle Warren
node.description: The tunnel turns at odd angles and disturbing slants, a distorted mirror-image -- if stone can be called a mirror -- of the room to the north. Torchlight flickers to the northwest, while the darkness waits at two other yawning entrances.

node.name: The Sewers, The Beetle Warren
node.description: In the darkness, senses other than sight press for attention: the chill of a clammy breeze or the stench of refuse and worse becomes ominous when eyesight fails and only an occasional splash breaks the silence.

node.name: The Sewers, The Ferret Warren
node.description: In the darkness, senses other than sight press for attention: the touch of a drop of water -- surely it's water? -- or the stench of refuse and worse becomes ominous when eyesight fails and only a low-pitched rumble breaks the silence.

node.name: The Sewers, The Ferret Warren
node.description: In the darkness, senses other than sight press for attention: something noiselessly brushing past or an odd whiff of incense becomes ominous when eyesight fails and only a low-pitched rumble breaks the silence.

node.name: The Sewers, The Ferret Warren
node.description: In the darkness, senses other than sight press for attention: the slip of a loose brick underfoot or a pungent, spicy aroma becomes ominous when eyesight fails and only what might be a footstep breaks the silence.

node.name: The Sewers, The Ferret Warren
node.description: In the darkness, senses other than sight press for attention: the chill of a clammy breeze or the reek of mold long in the making becomes ominous when eyesight fails and only a continual dripping breaks the silence.

node.name: The Sewers, The Ferret Warren
node.description: In the darkness, senses other than sight press for attention: the feel of soft, yielding mud or an odd whiff of incense becomes ominous when eyesight fails and only what might be a footstep breaks the silence.

node.name: The Sewers, The Ferret Warren
node.description: In the darkness, senses other than sight press for attention: the touch of a feathery, sticky strand or the smell of fish, fresh and otherwise, becomes ominous when eyesight fails and only an occasional splash breaks the silence.

node.name: The Sewers, The Snail Warren
node.description: In the darkness, senses other than sight press for attention: something silent brushing past or the stench of refuse and worse becomes ominous when eyesight fails and only a sound like a sigh breaks the silence.

node.name: The Sewers, The Snail Warren
node.description: In the darkness, senses other than sight press for attention: the feel of soft, yielding mud or the tang of the salt sea becomes ominous when eyesight fails and only an occasional splash breaks the silence.

node.name: The Sewers, The Snail Warren
node.description: In the darkness, senses other than sight press for attention: the touch of a drop of water -- surely it's water? -- or the smell of fish, fresh and otherwise, becomes ominous when eyesight fails and only a continual dripping breaks the silence.

node.name: The Sewers, Beneath the Grating
node.description: A faint light from the grating above shows this small, tile-lined room, hardly more than a wide connection in the system of pipes that regulates the flow of water that cleanses and refreshes Ratha. A big bronze valve is the only noteworthy feature in the place.

node.name: The Sewers, Beneath the Drain
node.description: Beneath the drain is a small, tile-lined room, part of the main sewer and water supply system, from the look of the big bronze valve that takes up most of one wall of the room.

node.name: The Sewers, The Beetle Warren
node.description: In the darkness, senses other than sight press for attention: the touch of a feathery, sticky strand or the tang of the salt sea becomes ominous when eyesight fails and only the click of claws on stone breaks the silence.

node.name: The Sewers, The Beetle Warren
node.description: In the darkness, senses other than sight press for attention: something noiselessly brushing past or a pungent, spicy aroma becomes ominous when eyesight fails and only a continual dripping breaks the silence.

node.description: In the darkness, senses other than sight press for attention: the slip of a loose brick underfoot or the reek of mold long in the making becomes ominous when eyesight fails and only an occasional splash breaks the silence.

node.name: The Sewers, The Beetle Warren
node.description: In the darkness, senses other than sight press for attention: the feel of soft, yielding mud or the stench of refuse and worse becomes ominous when eyesight fails and only a low-pitched rumble breaks the silence.

node.name: The Sewers, Beneath the Drain
node.description: The sewer drop under the grating is a small, tile-lined room. Rainwater from the street above flows into it and exits through a big bronze valve that seems oversized for that purpose.

node.name: The Sewers, The Ferret Warren
node.description: In the darkness, senses other than sight press for attention: the feel of soft, yielding mud or the stench of refuse and worse becomes ominous when eyesight fails and only the click of claws on stone breaks the silence.

node.name: Ehhrsk Highway
node.description: Green lichen growing on the walls glows with an eerie light, providing a small amount of illumination. The darkness makes one part of the tunnels look the same as the rest. A faint reek of sewage fills the air, but the area is clean of everything but a few cobwebs.

node.name: Ehhrsk Highway

node.description: Green lichen growing on the walls glows with an eerie light, providing a small amount of illumination. The darkness makes one part of the tunnels look the same as the rest. A faint reek of sewage fills the air, but the area is clean of everything but a few cobwebs.
