node.name: Ratha Traders' Guild, Hallway
node.description: From here the sounds of the warehouse beyond the steel door in the northern wall are fairly clear, though the specifics of things are hard to discern. Neutral-colored low-pile carpeting runs the length of the hall, showing a distinct traffic pattern at both ends of the hallway as well as back into the reception area through the arch.

node.name: Ratha Traders' Guild, Hallway
node.description: An ornate door dominates this end of the corridor, carvings upon its surface serving to enhance the inherent beauty of its wood. A natural hush falls upon this end of the guild, as though the impressive architecture commanded such respect.

node.name: Ratha Traders' Guild, Hallway
node.description: Bright artwork lines the cream-colored walls, splashes of design and color in an otherwise gloomy section of the hallway. To the side is the lounge established specifically for the guild and its members.

node.name: Ratha Traders' Guild, Warehouse Floor
node.description: Piled high in rows of freight, sturdy wooden crates mark the boundaries of walkways, orderly passages in which cargo trolleys are loaded and unloaded. Every shipment is carefully labeled with various markings, denoting point of origin and destination.

node.name: Ratha Traders' Guild, Warehouse Floor
node.description: The area opens up in a conscious effort to make room for larger amounts of foot traffic, the crates and shipping containers stacked tighter together than anywhere else in the warehouse. The floor is worn smooth in spots, kept swept clean by the passage of so many over time.

node.name: Ratha Traders' Guild, Warehouse Floor
node.description: The warehouse ends in a dim corner, tall stacks of freight providing a modicum of privacy in this otherwise open-ended space. Here the containers are stacked for long-term storage, in tidy rows for ease of storage as well as reclaimability.

node.name: Ratha Traders' Guild, Warehouse Floor
node.description: The entry is wide enough to accomodate the largest cart, opening a small alley between the back facade of the office section of the guild and the seemingly endless rows of arranged shipments. The atmosphere is one of barely contained frantic efficiency as guild clerks check and double-check shipments as they arrive and are sent out again. A large door in the outer wall, nearly half the size of the entire outer wall itself, is stuck in the open position.

node.name: Ratha Traders' Guild, Warehouse Floor
node.description: The warehouse begins where the offices leave off, the building's structure changing from whitewashed brick to steel and wood. Set into the back of the offices is a large steel-framed window providing a view of the interior headquarters. Cargo crates of all sizes dominate the floor space, making walls and corners of their own.

node.name: Ratha Traders' Guild, Warehouse Floor
node.description: This back corner of the warehouse is where extra, old or misplaced commodities are left to be forgotten. Tracks show through the light coating of dust, vermin by far the most common. Stamped crests and dates are faded from time, leaving little information on what is being stored or what the original destination may have been.

node.name: Ratha Traders' Guild, Lounge
node.description: Artwork adorns the walls of this otherwise utilitarian space. Several circular tables fill the room with seating surrounding them. A sideboard holds a delicate menu.

node.name: Ratha Traders' Guild, Wholesale Outlet
node.description: Sumptuous cloth hangs from ceiling to floor, covering as much wall space as possible. Underfoot, a plush and colorful rug softens the floor as well as masking distracting sounds. Lanterns hang from the fabric canopy, casting a soft glow on all the merchandise.

node.name: Ratha Trader Shop, Side Room
node.description: Dark cherrywood panels on the walls are accented by tapestries that hang from ceiling to floor. A thick burgundy carpet with gold tassels muffles most noise from the well-dressed traders that wander, speaking in undertones. Tall crystal and platinum candelabras sit in each corner, giving a soft but luxuriant light to the wares being offered.

node.name: Ratha Traders' Guild, Behind The Crate
node.description: Shipping containers, most of which look as though they haven't been moved in years, enclose a small open area to the rear of the warehouse, surrounding a large raised platform. Occasionally sounds drift down from the dais, but conversation here does not disrupt any auctions that may be in progress.

node.name: Ratha Traders' Guild, Raised Platform
node.description: Open floor space provides the necessary room for auctioneers, buyers, and sellers alike to peruse any items presented. A piece of fine parchment and a waiting list rest near a small stand, ready for use. Crates from the warehouse serve as walls, the height and depth ever-changing as stock is shipped in and out of the guild, and they contain the noise to the adjacent space, just off the platform.

node.name: Functional Furniture, Ratha Branch
node.description: A thin layer of red dust, blown in from the street outside, covers everything in the shop. Half-faded brush marks in the dirt on the floor indicate that the owner tries his best to keep the elements out, without much success. A single counter in the room holds items for sale, and a large sign hangs on the wall behind it.

node.name: Old Rat's Tavern, Attic Crawlspace
node.description: The stench of foul liquors and decaying wood is heavy, trapped and condensed in this cramped area as it wafts up from the bar rooms below. Sprawled on one precarious-looking support beam are the bones of a dead rat, almost comedically flayed as if it had succumbed to the odor.

node.name: Old Rat's Tavern, Attic Crawlspace
node.description: A simple cot has been roughly shoved where the roof gives the most ample headroom, allowing a sleepily unobservant soul to miss waking to a bump in the head. Rusting nails and old boards have been put to good use, making for a functional spot to place sundries. The pungent odors alone are enough to make one question what would make a person desperate enough to make residence here.

node.name: Drogor's Bite, Hiring Hall
node.description: Walls crafted from planks salvaged over the years from various ships give this office a distinctive feel -- much like the inside of a clubhouse. A net hangs over a rickety desk, holding shark jaws as decoration. Behind the desk is a doorway leading further into the building.

node.name: Drogor's Bite, Hallway
node.description: Dark brown paint barely hides the crate-quality wood used to construct this hallway's walls and the plain packed dirt floor does little to improve the area's dingy coloration. A cacophony of sounds penetrates from outside due to the shoddy construction.

node.name: Drogor's Bite, Historical Storage
node.description: Rows of bookcases fill this room in no observable pattern, creating a maze of paths and trapping dust motes in the dull light. Unrolled scrolls and maps drape off most of the overburdened shelves, making the narrow passages even tighter. A huge selection of charts lie one atop the other, their fraying edges giving the filled bookcase a feathery appearance. A weather-beaten buoy tilts against the far wall beneath a mounted harpoon.

node.name: Drogor's Bite, Caretaker's Room
node.description: So little light penetrates a filthy window above an equally filthy cot it is impossible to tell if it is day or night outside. A wobbly wood chair, one slightly shorter leg unsuccessfully leveled by a small wood chip, tilts against the far wall. A rain slicker and some tired-looking overalls hang from a rack.

node.name: Drogor's Bite, Lounge
node.description: In keeping with the rough and ready atmosphere of its normal clientele, the three tables and assorted chairs that clutter this lounge all bear the scars of heavy usage. Lying beneath one table is the splintered leg from an overturned chair while scattered across the tabletops are remnants of this room's last gathering.

node.name: Ratha Traders' Guild, Staging Area
node.description: Nestled against the outside wall of the guild, a plain but sturdy structure has been erected comprised of a roof and two walls, the front open to allow even the largest freight through. Drivers mill about as cargo is loaded and unloaded, crates borne on carts moving in and out of the guild through the door that has been rolled back out of the way. Pack animals fidget and add to the cacophony with their loud cries, the overall effect creating the general controlled chaos in which the guild operates.

node.name: Ratha Traders' Guild, Shipping Corner
node.description: A much smaller structure than the guild, but still a part of it, this squat building sits across the walkway from the main establishment. Here special shipments between guild members are stored or shipped, according to their destinations. Rich teak wainscoting lays against the painted brick walls and a dark carpet covers the floor.

node.name: Glythtide's Shrine
node.description: The shrine room is shaped like a burrow, all corners rounded and smooth. Mown grasses and meadowsweet stems cover the floor in a fragrant strewing, but the main focus of the shrine remains the statue honoring the god Glythtide.

node.name: Sshoi-sson Palace, Grand Provincial Bank, Vault
node.description: Away from the elegance of the bank's public areas, two burly guards with a no-nonsense air about them protect the iron-lined exchange vault. Liveried tellers glide in and out, handing leather pouches to the guards, who in turn pass the coins through a flickering moongate at the far end of the room. On one side, a languid S'Kra Mur Moon Mage reclines upon a plush quilted silk divan as she concentrates upon maintaining her part of the network of gates used by the bank.

node.name: Chabalu's Exotics, Cellar
node.description: Crates are stacked all over this room. Cobwebs choke the darkened corners of the cellar, and an inch of thick dust covers the floor.

node.name: Thieves' Guild, Ehhrsk Hall
node.description: Originally a natural cavern, this chamber now serves as the center for Ratha's dominant criminal element. Benches hewn from the walls serve the weary cutpurse. Air vented in from the surface reeks of sewage and stagnant water. A ladder carved into the stone of one wall leads up to a shallow niche that looks out over the whole hall.

node.name: Thieves' Guild, Leader's Alcove
node.description: This brightly lit office appears to belong to a bank clerk instead of Ratha's most powerful thief. From the beautiful landscapes that hang from the wall to the plush imported carpeting, this room screams wealth. Besides a large lock box in the corner, a wooden desk is the only piece of furniture in the room.

node.name: Thieves' Guild, Ehhrsk Haven
node.description: Smoky oil lamps light this dug-out chamber that is meant to be used as a safe haven for all that belong to the guild. Cots lined up along one wall are used by the more transient members. Piles of rock make it easy to go up or down to shadowy ledges on either side of the room.

node.name: Thieves' Guild, Niche
node.description: Carved shallowly into the bedrock, this small room serves as a guard post in times of trouble. Dark lichen grows on the walls and floor giving off a rotted stench.

node.name: Thieves' Guild, A Dark Passage
node.description: Light coming from the Haven barely illuminates this room. The air is heavy with moisture and thick with the smell of sewage. Dark green lichen covers the walls.

node.name: Thieves' Guild, A Dark Passage
node.description: Light coming from the Haven barely illuminates this room. The air is heavy with moisture and thick with the smell of sewage. Dark green lichen covers the walls.

node.name: A Garbage Chute
node.description: The stench is almost overwhelming in this suffocatingly-small crawlspace. A steel rung ladder, bolted securely to the wall, leads higher into the tunnel. The little amount of light adds to the sense of claustrophobia.

node.name: A Garbage Chute
node.description: The stench is terrible in this suffocatingly-small crawlspace. Street cleaners sweep refuse into the metal grates at the top of the tunnel. A steel rung ladder, securely bolted to the wall, leads downward into the smelly depths.

node.name: Forging Society, Bookstore
node.description: The shop is filled with the smell of raw metals, a smell so sharp that it clings to the teeth. A large iron door stands at the back of the room, acting as a barricade between the forge and the front shop. Sitting at a ticket counter is an elderly Elothean sales clerk, keeping the supply of books nice and orderly.

The shop is filled with the smell of raw metals, a smell so sharp that it clings to the teeth. A large iron door stands at the back of the room, acting as a barricade between the forge and the front shop. Sitting at a ticket counter is an elderly Elothean sales clerk, keeping the supply of books nice and orderly, while a series of three charts hangs on a nearby wall.

node.name: Forging Society, Tool Shop and Entryway
node.note: Forging Society|Forging tools|Forging clerk|clerk Forging|tools Forging
node.description: This passage acts as an entryway in and out of the forge. Stifling heat marches up from a large hall to the south, nearly destroying a subtle cross-breeze heading east and west. Sweat-soaked merchants offer assistance to crafters needing to resupply tools and materials. To the north, a thick iron door protects the outside office from the smothering heat.

node.name: Forging Society, East Passage
node.description: A gentle breeze stirs in this passage, adding a bit of relief to the blistering heat. To the south is a break room, and to the east are various grinding rooms. Even from here, the metal's wail can be heard.

node.name: Forging Society, Grinding Room
node.description: The warm air is filled with the smell of heated metal. Far from the sound of the hammers, the grindstones have been placed to allow for freedom of movement as journeyman smiths work to perfect their prized blades. Curious apprentices hover about, hoping to learn a trick or two studying those that take a turn at the wheel.

node.name: Forging Society, Grinding Room
node.description: A large grated window set high on the east side of this room provides a steady stream of air from the outside world. Set back from the rest of the forge, only the whining of grinding metals can be heard. A large grindstone is here, accompanied by a moderately clean bucket of cool water.

node.name: Forging Society, Grinding Room
node.description: This is a small grinding room set apart from the others. Conveniently located by the break room, it also tends to be the most used. Young Gor'Tog lads, looking to earn a spare coin for their families, work to sweep up shavings and oil the stones.

node.name: Forging Society, Break Room
node.description: This is a small, simple room set up to act as a break room for people working in the forge. Above, a small slitted window lets in some fresh air, helping to take a bite out of the heat. A rickety table made from salt-stained planks lies in the center of the room, offering simple snacks. Nearby on the floor is an open barrel with a tin ladle chained to it. Several crates line the floor as well, acting as chairs.

node.name: Forging Society, Maker's Mark Hall
node.description: Soot-stained red brick makes up the walls and floor of this large hall. Attendants offer maker's mark design services to eligible crafters here. The sound of bubbling metal echoes through passageways further south.

node.name: Forging Society, Foundry
node.description: Eerie shadows dance on the walls across the smudged passageway that leads out of the foundry to the northwest. A huge granite crucible hangs over the fire, suspended by heavy chains from a thick wooden beam. Black dust fills the air, spiraling up in the heat as it blows off a pile of fuel.

node.name: Forging Society, Foundry
node.description: The floor slopes toward a circular firepit fed by a large pile of crushed coal. A huge granite crucible hangs over the fire, suspended by heavy chains from a thick wooden beam. The only exit is a blackened passageway to the north.

node.name: Forging Society, Foundry
node.description: A huge granite crucible sways from a blackened beam in the center of the foundry. A large fire burns near the end of the crucible and an immense fuel pile is placed in convenient reach. A sooty passage to the northeast leads back to the hall.

node.name: Forging Society, Western Passage and Supply Depot
node.description: This expanded passage offers some protection from the heat and contains pallets of materials for crafters to order. Passages continue to the west, one streaked with oily handprints and two that have been haphazardly scrubbed down. From the west you can hear the pounding of hammers upon metal.

node.name: Forging Society, Forge
node.description: The ceiling of this forge has been cut away, leaving half the room under open sky. The forge sits close to the inner wall under the shelter of the covered half while a rusty anvil lies further out, with limited protection. Although this is a bit cramped compared to the other two forges, the constant airflow adds a great deal of relief from the heat.

node.name: Forging Society, Forge
node.description: A sturdy anvil dominates the center of this small forging area. Heat pours out from the glowing forge and permeates the room as a small ceiling shaft tries futilely to draw it outside. A slack tub stands guard below the forge, waiting to cool off the anvil's bounty, be they broken pieces or masterpieces.

node.name: Forging Society, Forge
node.description: Blackened stone walls enclose this simple forge. A great shaft lies in the slanted ceiling, breathing out fumes and smoke, yet not seeming to give any relief to the heat. An old anvil scratched with time and neglect stands ready for use near the tempered forge, its hot coals giving an odd glow to the room.

node.name: Ratha's Traders' Guild, Office of the Guildleader
node.description: A low pile cream carpet complements the dark paneling of the walls without being too obtrusive. With ample space for all the furniture, nothing appears cramped or haphazard here. Plush leather chairs sit before and behind the desk while a few extra wait nearby for use. A framed window in the northern wall provides a view of the warehouse floor.

node.name: Shore Walk, Rocky Path
node.description: Giant boulders are scattered haphazardly about the ocean near the beach. Curiously, smaller stones have been collected to form a rocky path atop the water -- wide enough for a pair of horses and long enough for at least ten. The ocean's floor drops away to invisible depths at the pathway's midpoint, leaving little doubt that the end is quite deep indeed. Tufts of soggy, seaweed-matted fur cling to the stones.

node.name: Aboard the Mammoth, Platform
node.description: Thick, barnacle-encrusted ropes secure the platform to the mammoth's back. The wooden planks follow the curve of the beast's neck, allowing the driver an elevated vantage point as he does his best to lead the sea creature to and fro across the vast ocean. Birds' nests can be seen all around the platform and are woven intricately into the fur.

node.name: Fang Cove, Fate's Fortune Lane
node.description: A towering marble archway opens a gap in the wall to the north and separates the ongoing construction and somewhat more refined completed structures of Fate's Fortune Lane from the crude structures and makeshift walkway along the beach. The entrance to a squat, wide bungalow sits in opposition to the arch, and the sheltering cliffs of Fang's Peak rise up from behind it. To either side of the arch, cobblestones of different shapes and sizes have been laid out to form the wide Fate's Fortune Lane.

node.name: The Raven's Mask and Leatherworks, Embosser's Workshop
node.description: Hanging from a beam in the ceiling, a menu board sways gently in the breeze. At the back of the alcove, a workbench cluttered with brushes, paints and other tools stands beside a mannequin. The mannequin is currently adorned with a leather gambeson which is being decorated with the crest of the Pantel family.

node.name: Forging Society, Bulk Materials
node.description: Tucked away in little more than a closet, this small space somehow manages to serve those who spend ample time in the nearby forges by supplying large quantities of the metals used. A lone, red-eyed clerk is crammed behind a makeshift counter -- a door resting atop two differently sized barrels. She coughs from time to time as the poorly ventilated area frequently fills with smoke.

node.name: Ratha Outfitting Society, Reception
node.description: Creamy marble with a mirror-like finish spreads across the floor underfoot, while a variety of animal hides and shields are displayed at various points upon the surrounding walls. A pair of brocade settees sit opposite each other at the center of the room, separated by a short oval table which is highlighted under the soft glow of the chandelier overhead. A S'Kra Mur clerk stands behind a nearby counter, making notes in a small ledger.

node.name: Ratha Outfitting Society, Office
node.description: Swathes of opulent silk sweep to each corner of the small office from a central point overhead, contrasting against the dark mahogany walls. A broad desk and tufted leather chair rest along a far wall, facing an arched window that overlooks the bustling street beyond, while a wide corridor leads further north.

node.name: Ratha Outfitting Society, Tool Shop
node.description: A trio of gaethzen orbs hangs overhead, casting a soft glow over the area and a small counter along one wall. The store's perimeter is lined with colorful wicker bins, each piled high with various waxes, tools and notions essential to the local craftsmen. In a nearby corner, a large clay planter overflows with sweet-smelling, golden melilots, the redolent blossoms adding a pleasant touch to the otherwise utilitarian room.

node.name: Ratha Outfitting Society, Corridor
node.description: Framed sketches dot the walls of the corridor beneath ornately jeweled sconces, each displaying a uniquely designed image. Several artisans bustle back and forth through the area, each laden with sacks filled with a variety of goods.

node.name: Ratha Outfitting Society, Corridor
node.description: Framed sketches dot the walls of the corridor beneath ornately jeweled sconces, each displaying a uniquely designed image. An ornately carved wooden bench rests against one wall, a quilted throw draped along the backrest, while a thick burgundy rug lies before archways of oak, maple, and walnut.

node.name: Ratha Outfitting Society, Book Store
node.description: Jeweled brass lanterns overhead highlight a mural of a magnificent palace that decorates one wall of the small book store. Flanked by broad potted palms, several shelves display a variety of books where patrons browse before making their purchases at the counter nestled in a nearby corner.

node.name: Ratha Outfitting Society, Supply Depot
node.description: A variety of animal hides decorate the walls of the small depot, a brass lantern overhead casting a soft glow over the area. Long tables line the room, each piled high with padding supplies and various leather hides, while nearby baskets overflow with an assortment of fibers.

node.name: Ratha Outfitting Society, Corridor
node.description: Framed sketches dot the walls of the corridor beneath ornately jeweled sconces, each displaying a uniquely designed image. An ornately carved wooden bench rests against one wall, a quilted throw draped along the backrest, while a thick burgundy rug lies before archways of oak, maple, and walnut.

node.name: Ratha Outfitting Society, Weaving Hall
node.description: Set in the back of the large workroom is a hefty loom. Hooks and shelves line the painted azure walls, holding various tools and spools of thread that are currently not in use. Next to the archway is a simple workbench and chair, a place to take a load off and enjoy a cool drink, and enjoy the fruits of one's labor.

node.name: Ratha Outfitting Society, Weaving Hall
node.description: Set in the back of the large workroom is a hefty loom. Hooks and shelves line the painted coral walls, holding various tools and spools of thread that are currently not in use. Next to the archway is a simple workbench and chair, a place to take a load off and enjoy a cool drink, and enjoy the fruits of one's labor.

node.name: Ratha Outfitting Society, Weaving Hall
node.description: Set in the back of the large workroom is a hefty loom. Hooks and shelves line the painted turquoise walls, holding various tools and spools of thread that are currently not in use. Next to the archway is a simple workbench and chair, a place to take a load off and enjoy a cool drink, and enjoy the fruits of one's labor.

node.name: Ratha Outfitting Society, Spinning Parlor
node.description: A vast tapestry of nine golden stars sprinkled on a midnight blue background hangs upon one of the painted turquoise walls, while a soft woolen rug blankets the floor underfoot. A large spinning wheel stands at the back of the parlor, while a large workbench and padded chair rest nearby, providing a place to relax or work on a project that requires more attention to detail.

node.name: Ratha Outfitting Society, Spinning Parlor
node.description: A vast tapestry of majestic galleon on a stormy sea hangs upon one of the painted azure walls, while a soft woolen rug blankets the floor underfoot. A large spinning wheel stands at the back of the parlor, while a large workbench and padded chair rest nearby, providing a place to relax or work on a project that requires more attention to detail.

node.name: Ratha Outfitting Society, Spinning Parlor
node.description: A vast tapestry of hearty rose blossoms hangs upon one of the painted coral walls, while a soft woolen rug blankets the floor underfoot. A large spinning wheel stands at the back of the parlor, while a large workbench and padded chair rest nearby, providing a place to relax or work on a project that requires more attention to detail.

node.name: Ratha Engineering Society, Main Hall
node.description: Whitewashed walls surround the hall, a series of nautical items hung at various points around the room. Wide wooden planks underfoot creak under the weight of large stone slabs that stand nearby, each awaiting inspection, while smaller carts of bone and wood are pushed under tarps to protect them from the salty air. A stern overseer keeps a close eye on things, barking at his associate when a new delivery arrives or needs moving. A wide stairway leads downward, further into the society, while a large waste bucket rests nearby.

node.name: Ratha Engineering Society, Office
node.description: At the far end of the small office is a stately desk piled with parchments and several ledgers, a built-in bookcase beyond overflowing with rows of books and personal trinkets. Hung beneath a pair of crossed, sun bleached oars, a large chalkboard details several of the society's stone shipments, while a trio of decorative pilings stands in a nearby corner.

node.name: Ratha Engineering Society, Repair and Storage
node.description: A heavy rope net drapes from the ceiling overhead, while a sweeping potted palm stands in a nearby corner of the brightly painted shop. The discarded hull of a dingy has been shaped into a counter for the Dwarven attendant, where he busies himself with the task of repairing tools and tending to the stored goods on the shelves behind him.

node.name: Ratha Engineering Society, Hallway
node.description: The long hallway echoes with a variety of clinks and clanks in the distance, while attendants bustle back and forth with deed orders. Brass lanterns hung overhead provide a minimal amount light, enough to indicate entrances to the east and west, along with the stairs that lead up to the main floor of the society.

node.name: Ratha Engineering Society, Depot
node.description: Several heavy blocks of marble and alabaster rest at various points along the painted brick walls, while additional shelves and tables hold a wide selection of bone and stone. Several stout workmen grunt under the weight of the rough-hewn crates they heft through the busy shop to the backroom.

node.name: Ratha Engineering Society, Crafting Supplies
node.description: An ornate stone pedestal at the center of the room displays a brass astrolabe and mistwood telescope, highlighted by a large brass lantern overhead. Workers periodically wander in and out, restocking the items held by the many baskets and shelves along the surrounding walls, while a nearby attendant sees to the craftsmen who stop by in need of supplies.

node.name: Ratha Engineering Society, Hallway
node.description: Artisans and attendants bustle throughout the area, the varied sounds of craftsmen echoing along the long hallway. Brass lanterns overhead highlight the compass pattern in the brick floor underfoot, while a trio of doors lead into several workshops where many perfect their craft.

node.name: Ratha Engineering Society, Workshop
node.description: A vibrant mural detailing crashing waves upon a rocky shoreline surrounds the workshop, the brass lanterns overhead providing additional lighting during the evening hours. Unfinished stone furniture, statues and more are spread across the surfaces of the dozens of reinforced tables that form neat rows along the length of the room. Several artisans pour over their creations, while attendants haul away other pieces too large to carry with an overhead system of pulleys and chains, storing them for later retrieval.

node.name: Ratha Engineering Society, Workshop
node.description: A vibrant mural detailing several galleons of the Redthorne fleet surrounds the workshop, the brass lanterns overhead providing additional lighting during the evening hours. Unfinished stone furniture, statues and more are spread across the surfaces of the dozens of reinforced tables that form neat rows along the length of the room. Several artisans pour over their creations, while attendants haul away other pieces too large to carry with an overhead system of pulleys and chains, storing them for later retrieval.

node.name: Ratha Engineering Society, Workshop
node.description: A vibrant nautical mural surrounds the workshop, the brass lanterns overhead providing additional lighting during the evening hours. Unfinished stone furniture, statues and more are spread across the surfaces of the dozens of reinforced tables that form neat rows along the length of the room. Several artisans pour over their creations, while attendants haul away other pieces too large to carry with an overhead system of pulleys and chains, storing them for later retrieval.

node.name: Ratha Alchemy Society, Foyer
node.description: Vibrant silks drape the polished granite walls amid the many potted plants that decorate the broad foyer. Marbled gaethzen orbs hang overhead, highlighting a pair of thickly-padded benches that surround a low table at the center of the room. A busy clerk tends to the many artisans that visit the society from behind a sturdy counter with a small placard on it.

node.name: Ratha Alchemy Society, Supply Shop
node.description: A vast array of colorful baskets and earthenware surround the shop, their essences mingling into a variety of sweet, musky scents. Brass oil lamps dangling overhead cast a soft glow over the wide counter below as several society workers tend to restocking and taking care of the needs of crafters.

node.name: Ratha Alchemy Society, Tool Depot
node.description: Several decorative bamboo shelves line the polished granite walls of the small shop, each displaying a variety of alchemical tools. Standing behind a broad counter, a young Elven lass greets the many crafters who stop to make their purchases.

node.name: Ratha Alchemy Society, Gathering Hall
node.description: Brass oil lamps overhead illuminate the surrounding polished granite, the walls spidered with clinging ivy that spills from planters cut into the dense stone near the ceiling. Colorful woven mats decorate the floor amid the rattan chairs, providing a place where many of the crafters rest and share their ideas.

node.name: Ratha Alchemy Society, Book Store
node.description: A small shelf advertising available alchemical books sits below a chart on alchemical techniques on one side of the small enclosure, while the other side an exhausted clerk notes work order completions on a board.

node.name: Ratha Alchemy Society, Office
node.description: Polished granite walls hung with clusters of dried herbs surround the small office, lit by a single brass lantern overhead. A large desk and chair stand in one corner, overlooking a pair of perpendicular workbenches covered with various tools of the trade.

node.name: Ratha Alchemy Society, Hallway
node.description: Slender brass planters mounted near the ceiling overflow with a variety of ivy plants, a few of their long tendrils clinging to the brightly painted granite walls. Framed specimens of pressed herbs dot the length of the corridor beneath ornately jeweled sconces, each displayed in an artful arrangement. An alabaster statue stands in a nearby corner, the maiden's urn spilling over with rich purple shalyria blossoms that scent the long corridor.

node.name: Ratha Alchemy Society, Hallway
node.description: Slender brass planters mounted near the ceiling overflow with a variety of ivy plants, a few of their long tendrils clinging to the brightly painted granite walls. A pair of ornately carved benches rest against the walls between the archways, their seats thinly padded and tossed with decorative pillows.

node.name: Ratha, Hidden Dock
node.description: Tucked behind one of the run-down warehouses, the dock seems to be mostly in disuse. However, a few newer looking ropes and boxes stacked up at the end of the pier indicate that it's not entirely abandoned. Sea waves lap against the wooden posts at the end of the dock in a constant back and forth.

node.name: Ratha Alchemy Society, Workroom
node.description: Carved out of dense granite, the laboratory holds a set of alchemical equipment scattered at various points about the room. The high ceilings are dotted with small holes that provide a way for deadly gasses to be released out of the area, while an archway out affords anyone in the room the chance to escape from a dangerous conflagration of chemicals.

node.name: Ratha Alchemy Society, Workroom
node.description: Carved out of dense granite, the laboratory holds a set of alchemical equipment scattered at various points about the room. The high ceilings are dotted with small holes that provide a way for deadly gasses to be released out of the area, while an archway out affords anyone in the room the chance to escape from a dangerous conflagration of chemicals.

node.name: Ratha Alchemy Society, Workroom
node.description: Carved out of dense granite, the laboratory holds a set of alchemical equipment scattered at various points about the room. The high ceilings are dotted with small holes that provide a way for deadly gasses to be released out of the area, while an archway out affords anyone in the room the chance to escape from a dangerous conflagration of chemicals.

node.name: Ratha, Rundmolen Post Office
node.description: Tucked away in a corner of the square is a wide stone counter set into the conical carousel beneath a wooden awning. Spread across the awning's underside is a sweeping mural of a summer sky, with realistic white clouds set against a cerulean blue expanse. Vast, countless rows of differently sized shelves are behind the counter, and complex Dwarven mechanisms can be heard as they rearrange the package-covered storage. Clerks shuffle endlessly back and forth between the counters and shelving as they assist patrons with their packaging and mailing needs.

node.name: Warrior Mage Guild, Lounge
node.description: Thick stone walls muffle the sounds of the world outside of the guildhall, creating a sense of peace. Thickly-cushioned chairs form a circle around a small oak table, its surface scarred by heated debates of the past. An oak door in the south wall is carved with the havri'negh symbol.

node.name: Warrior Mage Guild, Library
node.description: Long tables and padded benches of dark rosewood fill the room, their surfaces polished smooth from years of use. Two beveled-glass doors lead out onto a balcony which overlooks the tier's edge. Strategically placed lamps cast a gentle glow on the rows of books lining the bookshelves.

node.name: Warrior Mage Guild, Targeting Range
node.description: Set above the salle, the targeting range was created to train Warrior Mages in the most effective ways to disable their opponents with magic. The stone walls are scarred by blasts of fire and warped by lightning strikes. A slightly singed banner hangs on one side of the room.

node.name: Warrior Mage Guild, Balcony
node.description: An elaborately carved stone balustrade is the only barrier between the guildhall and the sheer drop that separates the tiers. Spreading out below is the vast expanse of the lower tiers, and the limitless depths of the ocean. A pair of beveled-glass doors lead back into the guild proper.

node.name: Ratha, The Rusted Tumbler
node.description: The rough-hewn wooden walls of the lean-to tilt at uneven angles, the packed dirt floor worn smooth in places and scuffed in others. Daylight filters through gaps in the patched canvas roof, illuminating drifting dust motes. A crooked, scratched table displays a rusted lantern and scattered metal bits, while the air carries the tang of salt and the ubiquitous stench of rotting rubbish.

label.text: Fuchsia rooms connect Ehhrsk Highway to the sewers
